verses.text_uthmani: طسٓ ۚ تِلْكَ ءَايَـٰتُ ٱلْقُرْءَانِ وَكِتَابٍ مُّبِينٍ
verses.text_uthmani_tajweed_parsed: ط<tajweed class='madda_necessary' data-type='madda-necesssary' data-description='Necessary Prolongation: 6 Vowels'>سٓ</tajweed>‌ۚ تِلْكَ ءَايَ<tajweed class='madda_normal' data-type='madda-normal' data-description='Normal Prolongation: 2 Vowels'>ـٰ</tajweed>تُ <tajweed class='ham_wasl' data-type='hamza-wasl' data-description='Hamzat ul Wasl' data-tajweed=':9883'>ٱ</tajweed>لْقُرْءَانِ وَكِتَا<tajweed class='idgh_ghn' data-type='idgham-without-ghunnah' data-description='Idgham - With Ghunnah' data-tajweed=':9884'>بٍ م</tajweed>ُّب<tajweed class='madda_permissible' data-type='madda-permissible' data-description='Permissible Prolongation: 2, 4, 6 Vowels'>ِي</tajweed>نٍ
verses.text_uthmani_transcribed: Ṭā Sīn, tilka āyātul-qur'āni wa kitābim mubīn(in).
verses.translation: Та - Син. Это знамения Корана - Той Книги, что ясно (все толкует)

verses.text_uthmani: هُدًى وَبُشْرَىٰ لِلْمُؤْمِنِينَ
verses.text_uthmani_tajweed_parsed: هُ<tajweed class='idgh_ghn' data-type='idgham-without-ghunnah' data-description='Idgham - With Ghunnah' data-tajweed=':9885'>دًى و</tajweed>َبُشْرَىٰ لِلْمُؤْمِن<tajweed class='madda_permissible' data-type='madda-permissible' data-description='Permissible Prolongation: 2, 4, 6 Vowels'>ِي</tajweed>نَ
verses.text_uthmani_transcribed: Hudaw wa busyrā lil-mu'minīn(a).
verses.translation: И Руководство, и благая Весть Для всех уверовавших (в Бога)

verses.text_uthmani: ٱلَّذِينَ يُقِيمُونَ ٱلصَّلَوٰةَ وَيُؤْتُونَ ٱلزَّكَوٰةَ وَهُم بِٱلْـَٔاخِرَةِ هُمْ يُوقِنُونَ
verses.text_uthmani_tajweed_parsed: ٱلَّذِينَ يُقِيمُونَ <tajweed class='ham_wasl' data-type='hamza-wasl' data-description='Hamzat ul Wasl' data-tajweed=':3638'>ٱ</tajweed><tajweed class='slnt' data-type='laam-shamsiyah' data-description='Lam Shamsiyyah'>ل</tajweed>صَّلَ<tajweed class='slnt' data-type='silent' data-description='Silent'>و</tajweed><tajweed class='madda_normal' data-type='madda-normal' data-description='Normal Prolongation: 2 Vowels'>ٲ</tajweed>ةَ وَيُؤْتُونَ <tajweed class='ham_wasl' data-type='hamza-wasl' data-description='Hamzat ul Wasl' data-tajweed=':3639'>ٱ</tajweed><tajweed class='slnt' data-type='laam-shamsiyah' data-description='Lam Shamsiyyah'>ل</tajweed>زَّكَ<tajweed class='slnt' data-type='silent' data-description='Silent'>و</tajweed><tajweed class='madda_normal' data-type='madda-normal' data-description='Normal Prolongation: 2 Vowels'>ٲ</tajweed>ةَ وَه<tajweed class='ikhf_shfw' data-type='ikhafa-shafawi' data-description='Ikhafa' Shafawi - With Meem' data-tajweed=':4710'>ُم ب</tajweed>ِ<tajweed class='ham_wasl' data-type='hamza-wasl' data-description='Hamzat ul Wasl' data-tajweed=':447'>ٱ</tajweed>لْأَخِرَةِ هُمْ يُوقِن<tajweed class='madda_permissible' data-type='madda-permissible' data-description='Permissible Prolongation: 2, 4, 6 Vowels'>ُو</tajweed>نَ
verses.text_uthmani_transcribed: Allażīna yuqīmūnaṣ-ṣalāta wa yu'tūnaz-zakāta wa hum bil-ākhirati hum yūqinūn(a).
verses.translation: Кто по часам молитву совершает, Дает закат И верит во вторую жизнь

verses.text_uthmani: إِنَّ ٱلَّذِينَ لَا يُؤْمِنُونَ بِٱلْـَٔاخِرَةِ زَيَّنَّا لَهُمْ أَعْمَـٰلَهُمْ فَهُمْ يَعْمَهُونَ
verses.text_uthmani_tajweed_parsed: إِ<tajweed class='ghn' data-type='ghunnah' data-description='Ghunnah: 2 Vowels'>نّ</tajweed>َ <tajweed class='ham_wasl' data-type='hamza-wasl' data-description='Hamzat ul Wasl' data-tajweed=':24'>ٱ</tajweed>لَّذِينَ لَا يُؤْمِنُونَ بِ<tajweed class='ham_wasl' data-type='hamza-wasl' data-description='Hamzat ul Wasl' data-tajweed=':447'>ٱ</tajweed>لْأَخِرَةِ زَيَّ<tajweed class='ghn' data-type='ghunnah' data-description='Ghunnah: 2 Vowels'>نّ</tajweed>َا لَهُمْ أَعْمَ<tajweed class='madda_normal' data-type='madda-normal' data-description='Normal Prolongation: 2 Vowels'>ـٰ</tajweed>لَهُمْ فَهُمْ يَعْمَه<tajweed class='madda_permissible' data-type='madda-permissible' data-description='Permissible Prolongation: 2, 4, 6 Vowels'>ُو</tajweed>نَ
verses.text_uthmani_transcribed: Innal-lażīna lā yu'minūna bil-ākhirati zayyannā lahum a'mālahum fahum ya'mahūn(a).
verses.translation: Для тех же, кто не верит в жизнь другую, Мы разукрасили (нечестие) их дел, И они бродят слепо (по земле)

verses.text_uthmani: أُو۟لَـٰٓئِكَ ٱلَّذِينَ لَهُمْ سُوٓءُ ٱلْعَذَابِ وَهُمْ فِى ٱلْـَٔاخِرَةِ هُمُ ٱلْأَخْسَرُونَ
verses.text_uthmani_tajweed_parsed: أُ<tajweed class='slnt' data-type='silent' data-description='Silent'>وْ</tajweed>لَ<tajweed class='madda_obligatory' data-type='madda-obligatory' data-description='Obligatory Prolongation: 4-5 Vowels'>ـٰٓ</tajweed>ئِكَ <tajweed class='ham_wasl' data-type='hamza-wasl' data-description='Hamzat ul Wasl' data-tajweed=':51'>ٱ</tajweed>لَّذِينَ لَهُمْ س<tajweed class='madda_obligatory' data-type='madda-obligatory' data-description='Obligatory Prolongation: 4-5 Vowels'>ُو</tajweed>ٓءُ <tajweed class='ham_wasl' data-type='hamza-wasl' data-description='Hamzat ul Wasl' data-tajweed=':9886'>ٱ</tajweed>لْعَذَابِ وَهُمْ فِى <tajweed class='ham_wasl' data-type='hamza-wasl' data-description='Hamzat ul Wasl' data-tajweed=':536'>ٱ</tajweed>لْأَخِرَةِ هُمُ <tajweed class='ham_wasl' data-type='hamza-wasl' data-description='Hamzat ul Wasl' data-tajweed=':6285'>ٱ</tajweed>لْأَخْسَر<tajweed class='madda_permissible' data-type='madda-permissible' data-description='Permissible Prolongation: 2, 4, 6 Vowels'>ُو</tajweed>نَ
verses.text_uthmani_transcribed: Ulā'ikal-lażīna lahum sū'ul-'ażābi wa hum fil-ākhirati humul-akhsarūn(a).
verses.translation: Они - все те, кому (назначена) суровая расплата, Кто в жизни будущей найбольшие потери понесет

verses.text_uthmani: وَإِنَّكَ لَتُلَقَّى ٱلْقُرْءَانَ مِن لَّدُنْ حَكِيمٍ عَلِيمٍ
verses.text_uthmani_tajweed_parsed: وَإِ<tajweed class='ghn' data-type='ghunnah' data-description='Ghunnah: 2 Vowels'>نّ</tajweed>َكَ لَتُلَقَّى <tajweed class='ham_wasl' data-type='hamza-wasl' data-description='Hamzat ul Wasl' data-tajweed=':9887'>ٱ</tajweed>لْقُرْءَانَ م<tajweed class='idgh_w_ghn' data-type='idgham-without-ghunnah' data-description='Idgham - Without Ghunnah' data-tajweed=':6233'>ِن ل</tajweed>َّدُنْ حَكِيمٍ عَل<tajweed class='madda_permissible' data-type='madda-permissible' data-description='Permissible Prolongation: 2, 4, 6 Vowels'>ِي</tajweed>مٍ
verses.text_uthmani_transcribed: Wa innaka latulaqqal-qur'āna mil ladun ḥakīmin 'alīm(in).
verses.translation: А ты ведь получаешь (руководство): Аль Кор'ан От Мудрого и Знающего (все)

verses.text_uthmani: إِذْ قَالَ مُوسَىٰ لِأَهْلِهِۦٓ إِنِّىٓ ءَانَسْتُ نَارًا سَـَٔاتِيكُم مِّنْهَا بِخَبَرٍ أَوْ ءَاتِيكُم بِشِهَابٍ قَبَسٍ لَّعَلَّكُمْ تَصْطَلُونَ
verses.text_uthmani_tajweed_parsed: إِذْ قَالَ مُوسَىٰ لِأَهْلِه<tajweed class='madda_obligatory' data-type='madda-obligatory' data-description='Obligatory Prolongation: 4-5 Vowels'>ِۦٓ</tajweed> إِ<tajweed class='ghn' data-type='ghunnah' data-description='Ghunnah: 2 Vowels'>نّ</tajweed><tajweed class='madda_obligatory' data-type='madda-obligatory' data-description='Obligatory Prolongation: 4-5 Vowels'>ِىٓ</tajweed> ءَانَسْتُ نَا<tajweed class='ikhf' data-type='ikhafa' data-description='Ikhafa'' data-tajweed=':9888'>رًا س</tajweed>َـَٔـاتِيك<tajweed class='idghm_shfw' data-type='idgham-shafawi' data-description='Idgham Shafawi - With Meem' data-tajweed=':9889'>ُم م</tajweed>ِّنْهَا بِخَبَرٍ أَوْ ءَاتِيك<tajweed class='ikhf_shfw' data-type='ikhafa-shafawi' data-description='Ikhafa' Shafawi - With Meem' data-tajweed=':9890'>ُم ب</tajweed>ِشِهَا<tajweed class='ikhf' data-type='ikhafa' data-description='Ikhafa'' data-tajweed=':9891'>بٍ ق</tajweed>َبَ<tajweed class='idgh_w_ghn' data-type='idgham-without-ghunnah' data-description='Idgham - Without Ghunnah' data-tajweed=':9892'>سٍ ل</tajweed>َّعَلَّكُمْ تَصْطَل<tajweed class='madda_permissible' data-type='madda-permissible' data-description='Permissible Prolongation: 2, 4, 6 Vowels'>ُو</tajweed>نَ
verses.text_uthmani_transcribed: Iż qāla mūsā li'ahlihī innī ānastu nārā(n), sa'ātīkum minhā bikhabarin au ātīkum bisyihābin qabasil la'allakum taṣṭalūn(a).
verses.translation: (Вы только вспомните), как Муса Сказал семейству своему: "Я чувствую присутствие огня. Я принесу оттуда вам какую-либо весть иль головешку, Чтоб вы могли согреться (у костра)

verses.text_uthmani: فَلَمَّا جَآءَهَا نُودِىَ أَنۢ بُورِكَ مَن فِى ٱلنَّارِ وَمَنْ حَوْلَهَا وَسُبْحَـٰنَ ٱللَّهِ رَبِّ ٱلْعَـٰلَمِينَ
verses.text_uthmani_tajweed_parsed: فَلَ<tajweed class='ghn' data-type='ghunnah' data-description='Ghunnah: 2 Vowels'>مّ</tajweed>َا ج<tajweed class='madda_obligatory' data-type='madda-obligatory' data-description='Obligatory Prolongation: 4-5 Vowels'>َا</tajweed>ٓءَهَا نُودِىَ أ<tajweed class='iqlb' data-type='iqlab' data-description='Iqlab' data-tajweed=':9893'>َنۢ ب</tajweed>ُورِكَ مَ<tajweed class='ikhf' data-type='ikhafa' data-description='Ikhafa'' data-tajweed=':2074'>ن ف</tajweed>ِى <tajweed class='ham_wasl' data-type='hamza-wasl' data-description='Hamzat ul Wasl' data-tajweed=':4674'>ٱ</tajweed><tajweed class='slnt' data-type='laam-shamsiyah' data-description='Lam Shamsiyyah'>ل</tajweed><tajweed class='ghn' data-type='ghunnah' data-description='Ghunnah: 2 Vowels'>نّ</tajweed>َارِ وَمَنْ حَوْلَهَا وَسُ<tajweed class='qlq' data-type='qalaqah' data-description='Qalaqah' data-tajweed=':6849'>بْ</tajweed>حَ<tajweed class='madda_normal' data-type='madda-normal' data-description='Normal Prolongation: 2 Vowels'>ـٰ</tajweed>نَ <tajweed class='ham_wasl' data-type='hamza-wasl' data-description='Hamzat ul Wasl' data-tajweed=':6850'>ٱ</tajweed>للَّهِ رَبِّ <tajweed class='ham_wasl' data-type='hamza-wasl' data-description='Hamzat ul Wasl' data-tajweed=':4'>ٱ</tajweed>لْعَ<tajweed class='madda_normal' data-type='madda-normal' data-description='Normal Prolongation: 2 Vowels'>ـٰ</tajweed>لَم<tajweed class='madda_permissible' data-type='madda-permissible' data-description='Permissible Prolongation: 2, 4, 6 Vowels'>ِي</tajweed>نَ
verses.text_uthmani_transcribed: Falammā jā'ahā nūdiya am būrika man fin-nāri wa man ḥaulahā, wa subḥānallāhi rabbil-'ālamīn(a).
verses.translation: Когда ж к огню он подошел, раздался голос: "Благословен будь тот, кто на огонь пришел, И то, что вкруг него, - благословенно! Хвала Аллаху, Господу миров

verses.text_uthmani: يَـٰمُوسَىٰٓ إِنَّهُۥٓ أَنَا ٱللَّهُ ٱلْعَزِيزُ ٱلْحَكِيمُ
verses.text_uthmani_tajweed_parsed: يَ<tajweed class='madda_normal' data-type='madda-normal' data-description='Normal Prolongation: 2 Vowels'>ـٰ</tajweed>مُوسَ<tajweed class='madda_obligatory' data-type='madda-obligatory' data-description='Obligatory Prolongation: 4-5 Vowels'>ىٰٓ</tajweed> إِ<tajweed class='ghn' data-type='ghunnah' data-description='Ghunnah: 2 Vowels'>نّ</tajweed>َهُ<tajweed class='madda_obligatory' data-type='madda-obligatory' data-description='Obligatory Prolongation: 4-5 Vowels'>ۥٓ</tajweed> أَنَا <tajweed class='ham_wasl' data-type='hamza-wasl' data-description='Hamzat ul Wasl' data-tajweed=':8455'>ٱ</tajweed>للَّهُ <tajweed class='ham_wasl' data-type='hamza-wasl' data-description='Hamzat ul Wasl' data-tajweed=':9894'>ٱ</tajweed>لْعَزِيزُ <tajweed class='ham_wasl' data-type='hamza-wasl' data-description='Hamzat ul Wasl' data-tajweed=':681'>ٱ</tajweed>لْحَك<tajweed class='madda_permissible' data-type='madda-permissible' data-description='Permissible Prolongation: 2, 4, 6 Vowels'>ِي</tajweed>مُ
verses.text_uthmani_transcribed: Yā mūsā innahū anallāhul-'azīzul-ḥakīm(u).
verses.translation: О Муса! Я, поистине, Аллах, Могуч и мудр

verses.text_uthmani: وَأَلْقِ عَصَاكَ ۚ فَلَمَّا رَءَاهَا تَهْتَزُّ كَأَنَّهَا جَآنٌّ وَلَّىٰ مُدْبِرًا وَلَمْ يُعَقِّبْ ۚ يَـٰمُوسَىٰ لَا تَخَفْ إِنِّى لَا يَخَافُ لَدَىَّ ٱلْمُرْسَلُونَ
verses.text_uthmani_tajweed_parsed: وَأَلْقِ عَصَاكَ‌ۚ فَلَ<tajweed class='ghn' data-type='ghunnah' data-description='Ghunnah: 2 Vowels'>مّ</tajweed>َا رَءَاهَا تَهْتَزُّ كَأَ<tajweed class='ghn' data-type='ghunnah' data-description='Ghunnah: 2 Vowels'>نّ</tajweed>َهَا ج<tajweed class='madda_necessary' data-type='madda-necesssary' data-description='Necessary Prolongation: 6 Vowels'>َا</tajweed>ٓ<tajweed class='idgh_ghn' data-type='idgham-without-ghunnah' data-description='Idgham - With Ghunnah' data-tajweed=':9895'><tajweed class='ghn' data-type='ghunnah' data-description='Ghunnah: 2 Vowels'>نّ</tajweed>ٌ و</tajweed>َلَّىٰ مُ<tajweed class='qlq' data-type='qalaqah' data-description='Qalaqah' data-tajweed=':9896'>دْ</tajweed>بِ<tajweed class='idgh_ghn' data-type='idgham-without-ghunnah' data-description='Idgham - With Ghunnah' data-tajweed=':9897'>رًا و</tajweed>َلَمْ يُعَقِّ<tajweed class='qlq' data-type='qalaqah' data-description='Qalaqah' data-tajweed=':9898'>بْ</tajweed>‌ۚ يَ<tajweed class='madda_normal' data-type='madda-normal' data-description='Normal Prolongation: 2 Vowels'>ـٰ</tajweed>مُوسَىٰ لَا تَخَفْ إِ<tajweed class='ghn' data-type='ghunnah' data-description='Ghunnah: 2 Vowels'>نّ</tajweed>ِى لَا يَخَافُ لَدَىَّ <tajweed class='ham_wasl' data-type='hamza-wasl' data-description='Hamzat ul Wasl' data-tajweed=':9899'>ٱ</tajweed>لْمُرْسَل<tajweed class='madda_permissible' data-type='madda-permissible' data-description='Permissible Prolongation: 2, 4, 6 Vowels'>ُو</tajweed>نَ
verses.text_uthmani_transcribed: Wa alqi 'aṣāk(a), falammā ra'āhā tahtazzu ka'annahā jānnuw wallā mudbiraw wa lam yu'aqqib, yā mūsā lā takhaf, innī lā yakhāfu ladayyal-mursalūn(a).
verses.translation: Брось посох свой!" Когда увидел он, Что взвился его посох змеем, Отпрянул он назад И не вернулся, (чтобы взять его). (И тут вновь голос прозвучал): "О Муса! Не бойся, - ведь в присутствии Моем Все посланные Мною не испытывают страха

verses.text_uthmani: إِلَّا مَن ظَلَمَ ثُمَّ بَدَّلَ حُسْنًۢا بَعْدَ سُوٓءٍ فَإِنِّى غَفُورٌ رَّحِيمٌ
verses.text_uthmani_tajweed_parsed: إِلَّا مَ<tajweed class='ikhf' data-type='ikhafa' data-description='Ikhafa'' data-tajweed=':8211'>ن ظ</tajweed>َلَمَ ثُ<tajweed class='ghn' data-type='ghunnah' data-description='Ghunnah: 2 Vowels'>مّ</tajweed>َ بَدَّلَ حُسْن<tajweed class='iqlb' data-type='iqlab' data-description='Iqlab' data-tajweed=':9900'>َۢا ب</tajweed>َعْدَ س<tajweed class='madda_obligatory' data-type='madda-obligatory' data-description='Obligatory Prolongation: 4-5 Vowels'>ُو</tajweed>ٓ<tajweed class='ikhf' data-type='ikhafa' data-description='Ikhafa'' data-tajweed=':9901'>ءٍ ف</tajweed>َإِ<tajweed class='ghn' data-type='ghunnah' data-description='Ghunnah: 2 Vowels'>نّ</tajweed>ِى غَفُو<tajweed class='idgh_w_ghn' data-type='idgham-without-ghunnah' data-description='Idgham - Without Ghunnah' data-tajweed=':890'>رٌ ر</tajweed>َّح<tajweed class='madda_permissible' data-type='madda-permissible' data-description='Permissible Prolongation: 2, 4, 6 Vowels'>ِي</tajweed>مٌ
verses.text_uthmani_transcribed: Illā man ẓalama ṡumma baddala ḥusnam ba'da sū'in fa innī gafūrur raḥīm(un).
verses.translation: А если кто-нибудь из них содеет зло И после этого добром его заменит, - Так Я, поистине, прощающ, милосерд

verses.text_uthmani: وَأَدْخِلْ يَدَكَ فِى جَيْبِكَ تَخْرُجْ بَيْضَآءَ مِنْ غَيْرِ سُوٓءٍ ۖ فِى تِسْعِ ءَايَـٰتٍ إِلَىٰ فِرْعَوْنَ وَقَوْمِهِۦٓ ۚ إِنَّهُمْ كَانُوا۟ قَوْمًا فَـٰسِقِينَ
verses.text_uthmani_tajweed_parsed: وَأَ<tajweed class='qlq' data-type='qalaqah' data-description='Qalaqah' data-tajweed=':9902'>دْ</tajweed>خِلْ يَدَكَ فِى جَيْبِكَ تَخْرُ<tajweed class='qlq' data-type='qalaqah' data-description='Qalaqah' data-tajweed=':8461'>جْ</tajweed> بَيْض<tajweed class='madda_obligatory' data-type='madda-obligatory' data-description='Obligatory Prolongation: 4-5 Vowels'>َا</tajweed>ٓءَ مِنْ غَيْرِ س<tajweed class='madda_obligatory' data-type='madda-obligatory' data-description='Obligatory Prolongation: 4-5 Vowels'>ُو</tajweed>ٓ<tajweed class='ikhf' data-type='ikhafa' data-description='Ikhafa'' data-tajweed=':9903'>ءٍ‌ۖ ف</tajweed>ِى تِسْعِ ءَايَ<tajweed class='madda_normal' data-type='madda-normal' data-description='Normal Prolongation: 2 Vowels'>ـٰ</tajweed>تٍ إِلَىٰ فِرْعَوْنَ وَقَوْمِه<tajweed class='madda_obligatory' data-type='madda-obligatory' data-description='Obligatory Prolongation: 4-5 Vowels'>ِۦٓ‌ۚ</tajweed> إِ<tajweed class='ghn' data-type='ghunnah' data-description='Ghunnah: 2 Vowels'>نّ</tajweed>َهُمْ كَانُو<tajweed class='slnt' data-type='silent' data-description='Silent'>اْ</tajweed> قَوْ<tajweed class='ikhf' data-type='ikhafa' data-description='Ikhafa'' data-tajweed=':5652'>مًا ف</tajweed>َ<tajweed class='madda_normal' data-type='madda-normal' data-description='Normal Prolongation: 2 Vowels'>ـٰ</tajweed>سِق<tajweed class='madda_permissible' data-type='madda-permissible' data-description='Permissible Prolongation: 2, 4, 6 Vowels'>ِي</tajweed>نَ
verses.text_uthmani_transcribed: Wa adkhil yadaka fī jaibika takhruj baiḍā'a min gairi sū'(in), fī tis'i āyātin ilā fir'auna wa qaumih(ī), innahum kānū qauman fāsiqīn(a).
verses.translation: Теперь за пазуху ты руку положи, И она выйдет, белизной сверкая, Без всякого вреда тебе И как одно из девяти знамений, Что Фараону и его народу явишь ты. Они ведь, истинно, распутны

verses.text_uthmani: فَلَمَّا جَآءَتْهُمْ ءَايَـٰتُنَا مُبْصِرَةً قَالُوا۟ هَـٰذَا سِحْرٌ مُّبِينٌ
verses.text_uthmani_tajweed_parsed: فَلَ<tajweed class='ghn' data-type='ghunnah' data-description='Ghunnah: 2 Vowels'>مّ</tajweed>َا ج<tajweed class='madda_obligatory' data-type='madda-obligatory' data-description='Obligatory Prolongation: 4-5 Vowels'>َا</tajweed>ٓءَتْهُمْ ءَايَ<tajweed class='madda_normal' data-type='madda-normal' data-description='Normal Prolongation: 2 Vowels'>ـٰ</tajweed>تُنَا مُ<tajweed class='qlq' data-type='qalaqah' data-description='Qalaqah' data-tajweed=':7692'>بْ</tajweed>صِرَ<tajweed class='ikhf' data-type='ikhafa' data-description='Ikhafa'' data-tajweed=':9904'>ةً ق</tajweed>َالُو<tajweed class='slnt' data-type='silent' data-description='Silent'>اْ</tajweed> هَ<tajweed class='madda_normal' data-type='madda-normal' data-description='Normal Prolongation: 2 Vowels'>ـٰ</tajweed>ذَا سِحْ<tajweed class='idgh_ghn' data-type='idgham-without-ghunnah' data-description='Idgham - With Ghunnah' data-tajweed=':3879'>رٌ م</tajweed>ُّب<tajweed class='madda_permissible' data-type='madda-permissible' data-description='Permissible Prolongation: 2, 4, 6 Vowels'>ِي</tajweed>نٌ
verses.text_uthmani_transcribed: Falammā jā'athum āyātunā mubṣiratan qālū hāżā siḥrum mubīn(un).
verses.translation: Когда же ощутимо и наглядно Наши знамения пришли к ним, Они сказали: "Это - явно колдовство

verses.text_uthmani: وَجَحَدُوا۟ بِهَا وَٱسْتَيْقَنَتْهَآ أَنفُسُهُمْ ظُلْمًا وَعُلُوًّا ۚ فَٱنظُرْ كَيْفَ كَانَ عَـٰقِبَةُ ٱلْمُفْسِدِينَ
verses.text_uthmani_tajweed_parsed: وَجَحَدُو<tajweed class='slnt' data-type='silent' data-description='Silent'>اْ</tajweed> بِهَا وَ<tajweed class='ham_wasl' data-type='hamza-wasl' data-description='Hamzat ul Wasl' data-tajweed=':9905'>ٱ</tajweed>سْتَيْقَنَتْه<tajweed class='madda_obligatory' data-type='madda-obligatory' data-description='Obligatory Prolongation: 4-5 Vowels'>َآ</tajweed> أَ<tajweed class='ikhf' data-type='ikhafa' data-description='Ikhafa'' data-tajweed=':2341'>نف</tajweed>ُسُهُمْ ظُلْ<tajweed class='idgh_ghn' data-type='idgham-without-ghunnah' data-description='Idgham - With Ghunnah' data-tajweed=':9906'>مًا و</tajweed>َعُلُو<tajweed class='ikhf' data-type='ikhafa' data-description='Ikhafa'' data-tajweed=':9907'>ًّا‌ۚ ف</tajweed>َ<tajweed class='ham_wasl' data-type='hamza-wasl' data-description='Hamzat ul Wasl' data-tajweed=':1513'>ٱ</tajweed><tajweed class='ikhf' data-type='ikhafa' data-description='Ikhafa'' data-tajweed=':1513'>نظ</tajweed>ُرْ كَيْفَ كَانَ عَ<tajweed class='madda_normal' data-type='madda-normal' data-description='Normal Prolongation: 2 Vowels'>ـٰ</tajweed>قِبَةُ <tajweed class='ham_wasl' data-type='hamza-wasl' data-description='Hamzat ul Wasl' data-tajweed=':4852'>ٱ</tajweed>لْمُفْسِد<tajweed class='madda_permissible' data-type='madda-permissible' data-description='Permissible Prolongation: 2, 4, 6 Vowels'>ِي</tajweed>نَ
verses.text_uthmani_transcribed: Wa jaḥadū bihā wastaiqanathā anfusuhum ẓulmaw wa 'uluwwā(n), fanẓur kaifa kāna 'āqibatul-mufsidīn(a).
verses.translation: Из величания и зла Они не приняли знаменья эти, Хотя их души убедились в истинности их, - Так посмотри, каков конец был тех, Кто развращал (людские нравы), (Внося нечестие и) порчу в них

verses.text_uthmani: وَلَقَدْ ءَاتَيْنَا دَاوُۥدَ وَسُلَيْمَـٰنَ عِلْمًا ۖ وَقَالَا ٱلْحَمْدُ لِلَّهِ ٱلَّذِى فَضَّلَنَا عَلَىٰ كَثِيرٍ مِّنْ عِبَادِهِ ٱلْمُؤْمِنِينَ
verses.text_uthmani_tajweed_parsed: وَلَقَ<tajweed class='qlq' data-type='qalaqah' data-description='Qalaqah' data-tajweed=':341'>دْ</tajweed> ءَاتَيْنَا دَاوُ<tajweed class='madda_normal' data-type='madda-normal' data-description='Normal Prolongation: 2 Vowels'>ۥ</tajweed>دَ وَسُلَيْمَ<tajweed class='madda_normal' data-type='madda-normal' data-description='Normal Prolongation: 2 Vowels'>ـٰ</tajweed>نَ عِلْ<tajweed class='idgh_ghn' data-type='idgham-without-ghunnah' data-description='Idgham - With Ghunnah' data-tajweed=':9908'>مًا‌ۖ و</tajweed>َقَالَا <tajweed class='ham_wasl' data-type='hamza-wasl' data-description='Hamzat ul Wasl' data-tajweed=':9909'>ٱ</tajweed>لْحَمْدُ لِلَّهِ <tajweed class='ham_wasl' data-type='hamza-wasl' data-description='Hamzat ul Wasl' data-tajweed=':3912'>ٱ</tajweed>لَّذِى فَضَّلَنَا عَلَىٰ كَثِي<tajweed class='idgh_ghn' data-type='idgham-without-ghunnah' data-description='Idgham - With Ghunnah' data-tajweed=':3126'>رٍ م</tajweed>ِّنْ عِبَادِهِ <tajweed class='ham_wasl' data-type='hamza-wasl' data-description='Hamzat ul Wasl' data-tajweed=':9910'>ٱ</tajweed>لْمُؤْمِن<tajweed class='madda_permissible' data-type='madda-permissible' data-description='Permissible Prolongation: 2, 4, 6 Vowels'>ِي</tajweed>نَ
verses.text_uthmani_transcribed: Wa laqad ātainā dāwūda wa sulaimāna 'ilmā(n), wa qālal-ḥamdu lillāhil-lażī faḍḍalanā 'alā kaṡīrim min 'ibādihil-mu'minīn(a).
verses.translation: Мы одарили знанием Дауда и (его сына) Сулеймана, И они оба возгласили: "Хвала Аллаху, Кто пристрастие Свое к нам проявил Пред многими из верных слуг Своих

verses.text_uthmani: وَوَرِثَ سُلَيْمَـٰنُ دَاوُۥدَ ۖ وَقَالَ يَـٰٓأَيُّهَا ٱلنَّاسُ عُلِّمْنَا مَنطِقَ ٱلطَّيْرِ وَأُوتِينَا مِن كُلِّ شَىْءٍ ۖ إِنَّ هَـٰذَا لَهُوَ ٱلْفَضْلُ ٱلْمُبِينُ
verses.text_uthmani_tajweed_parsed: وَوَرِثَ سُلَيْمَ<tajweed class='madda_normal' data-type='madda-normal' data-description='Normal Prolongation: 2 Vowels'>ـٰ</tajweed>نُ دَاوُ<tajweed class='madda_normal' data-type='madda-normal' data-description='Normal Prolongation: 2 Vowels'>ۥ</tajweed>دَ‌ۖ وَقَالَ يَ<tajweed class='madda_obligatory' data-type='madda-obligatory' data-description='Obligatory Prolongation: 4-5 Vowels'>ـٰٓ</tajweed>أَيُّهَا <tajweed class='ham_wasl' data-type='hamza-wasl' data-description='Hamzat ul Wasl' data-tajweed=':82'>ٱ</tajweed><tajweed class='slnt' data-type='laam-shamsiyah' data-description='Lam Shamsiyyah'>ل</tajweed><tajweed class='ghn' data-type='ghunnah' data-description='Ghunnah: 2 Vowels'>نّ</tajweed>َاسُ عُلِّمْنَا مَ<tajweed class='ikhf' data-type='ikhafa' data-description='Ikhafa'' data-tajweed=':9911'>نط</tajweed>ِقَ <tajweed class='ham_wasl' data-type='hamza-wasl' data-description='Hamzat ul Wasl' data-tajweed=':9912'>ٱ</tajweed><tajweed class='slnt' data-type='laam-shamsiyah' data-description='Lam Shamsiyyah'>ل</tajweed>طَّيْرِ وَأُوتِينَا مِ<tajweed class='ikhf' data-type='ikhafa' data-description='Ikhafa'' data-tajweed=':843'>ن ك</tajweed>ُلِّ شَىْءٍ‌ۖ إِ<tajweed class='ghn' data-type='ghunnah' data-description='Ghunnah: 2 Vowels'>نّ</tajweed>َ هَ<tajweed class='madda_normal' data-type='madda-normal' data-description='Normal Prolongation: 2 Vowels'>ـٰ</tajweed>ذَا لَهُوَ <tajweed class='ham_wasl' data-type='hamza-wasl' data-description='Hamzat ul Wasl' data-tajweed=':9913'>ٱ</tajweed>لْفَضْلُ <tajweed class='ham_wasl' data-type='hamza-wasl' data-description='Hamzat ul Wasl' data-tajweed=':9914'>ٱ</tajweed>لْمُب<tajweed class='madda_permissible' data-type='madda-permissible' data-description='Permissible Prolongation: 2, 4, 6 Vowels'>ِي</tajweed>نُ
verses.text_uthmani_transcribed: Wa wariṡa sulaimānu dāwūda wa qāla yā ayyuhan-nāsu 'ullimnā manṭiqaṭ-ṭairi wa ūtīnā min kulli syai'(in), inna hāżā lahuwal-faḍlul-mubīn(u).
verses.translation: И стал наследником Дауда Сулейман, И он сказал: "О люди! Нас научили понимать язык пернатых И даровали (долю) всех вещей, - В этом, поистине, (Господня) благосклонность (к нам)

verses.text_uthmani: وَحُشِرَ لِسُلَيْمَـٰنَ جُنُودُهُۥ مِنَ ٱلْجِنِّ وَٱلْإِنسِ وَٱلطَّيْرِ فَهُمْ يُوزَعُونَ
verses.text_uthmani_tajweed_parsed: وَحُشِرَ لِسُلَيْمَ<tajweed class='madda_normal' data-type='madda-normal' data-description='Normal Prolongation: 2 Vowels'>ـٰ</tajweed>نَ جُنُودُهُ<tajweed class='madda_normal' data-type='madda-normal' data-description='Normal Prolongation: 2 Vowels'>ۥ</tajweed> مِنَ <tajweed class='ham_wasl' data-type='hamza-wasl' data-description='Hamzat ul Wasl' data-tajweed=':4673'>ٱ</tajweed>لْجِ<tajweed class='ghn' data-type='ghunnah' data-description='Ghunnah: 2 Vowels'>نّ</tajweed>ِ وَ<tajweed class='ham_wasl' data-type='hamza-wasl' data-description='Hamzat ul Wasl' data-tajweed=':4418'>ٱ</tajweed>لْإِ<tajweed class='ikhf' data-type='ikhafa' data-description='Ikhafa'' data-tajweed=':4418'>نس</tajweed>ِ وَ<tajweed class='ham_wasl' data-type='hamza-wasl' data-description='Hamzat ul Wasl' data-tajweed=':9915'>ٱ</tajweed><tajweed class='slnt' data-type='laam-shamsiyah' data-description='Lam Shamsiyyah'>ل</tajweed>طَّيْرِ فَهُمْ يُوزَع<tajweed class='madda_permissible' data-type='madda-permissible' data-description='Permissible Prolongation: 2, 4, 6 Vowels'>ُو</tajweed>نَ
verses.text_uthmani_transcribed: Wa ḥusyira lisulaimāna junūduhū minal-jinni wal-insi waṭ-ṭairi fahum yūza'ūn(a).
verses.translation: И к Сулейману были собраны все воинства его: Из джиннов, воинов и птиц - И разместились все (по назначению и виду)

verses.text_uthmani: حَتَّىٰٓ إِذَآ أَتَوْا۟ عَلَىٰ وَادِ ٱلنَّمْلِ قَالَتْ نَمْلَةٌ يَـٰٓأَيُّهَا ٱلنَّمْلُ ٱدْخُلُوا۟ مَسَـٰكِنَكُمْ لَا يَحْطِمَنَّكُمْ سُلَيْمَـٰنُ وَجُنُودُهُۥ وَهُمْ لَا يَشْعُرُونَ
verses.text_uthmani_tajweed_parsed: حَتَّ<tajweed class='madda_obligatory' data-type='madda-obligatory' data-description='Obligatory Prolongation: 4-5 Vowels'>ىٰٓ</tajweed> إِذ<tajweed class='madda_obligatory' data-type='madda-obligatory' data-description='Obligatory Prolongation: 4-5 Vowels'>َآ</tajweed> أَتَوْ<tajweed class='slnt' data-type='silent' data-description='Silent'>اْ</tajweed> عَلَىٰ وَادِ <tajweed class='ham_wasl' data-type='hamza-wasl' data-description='Hamzat ul Wasl' data-tajweed=':9916'>ٱ</tajweed><tajweed class='slnt' data-type='laam-shamsiyah' data-description='Lam Shamsiyyah'>ل</tajweed><tajweed class='ghn' data-type='ghunnah' data-description='Ghunnah: 2 Vowels'>نّ</tajweed>َمْلِ قَالَتْ نَمْلَ<tajweed class='idgh_ghn' data-type='idgham-without-ghunnah' data-description='Idgham - With Ghunnah' data-tajweed=':9917'>ةٌ ي</tajweed>َ<tajweed class='madda_obligatory' data-type='madda-obligatory' data-description='Obligatory Prolongation: 4-5 Vowels'>ـٰٓ</tajweed>أَيُّهَا <tajweed class='ham_wasl' data-type='hamza-wasl' data-description='Hamzat ul Wasl' data-tajweed=':9918'>ٱ</tajweed><tajweed class='slnt' data-type='laam-shamsiyah' data-description='Lam Shamsiyyah'>ل</tajweed><tajweed class='ghn' data-type='ghunnah' data-description='Ghunnah: 2 Vowels'>نّ</tajweed>َمْلُ <tajweed class='ham_wasl' data-type='hamza-wasl' data-description='Hamzat ul Wasl' data-tajweed=':9919'>ٱ</tajweed><tajweed class='qlq' data-type='qalaqah' data-description='Qalaqah' data-tajweed=':278'>دْ</tajweed>خُلُو<tajweed class='slnt' data-type='silent' data-description='Silent'>اْ</tajweed> مَسَ<tajweed class='madda_normal' data-type='madda-normal' data-description='Normal Prolongation: 2 Vowels'>ـٰ</tajweed>كِنَكُمْ لَا يَحْطِمَ<tajweed class='ghn' data-type='ghunnah' data-description='Ghunnah: 2 Vowels'>نّ</tajweed>َكُمْ سُلَيْمَ<tajweed class='madda_normal' data-type='madda-normal' data-description='Normal Prolongation: 2 Vowels'>ـٰ</tajweed>نُ وَجُنُودُهُ<tajweed class='madda_normal' data-type='madda-normal' data-description='Normal Prolongation: 2 Vowels'>ۥ</tajweed> وَهُمْ لَا يَشْعُر<tajweed class='madda_permissible' data-type='madda-permissible' data-description='Permissible Prolongation: 2, 4, 6 Vowels'>ُو</tajweed>نَ
verses.text_uthmani_transcribed: Ḥattā iżā atau 'alā wādin-naml(i), qālat namlatuy yā ayyuhan-namludkhulū masākinakum, lā yaḥṭimannakum sulaimānu wa junūduhū wa hum lā yasy'urūn(a).
verses.translation: Со временем, Когда они пришли в долину муравьев, Одна из муравьих сказала: "О муравьи! (Скорее) прячьтесь по своим домам, Чтоб Сулейман и воинства его Не растоптали вас, сами того не замечая

verses.text_uthmani: فَتَبَسَّمَ ضَاحِكًا مِّن قَوْلِهَا وَقَالَ رَبِّ أَوْزِعْنِىٓ أَنْ أَشْكُرَ نِعْمَتَكَ ٱلَّتِىٓ أَنْعَمْتَ عَلَىَّ وَعَلَىٰ وَٰلِدَىَّ وَأَنْ أَعْمَلَ صَـٰلِحًا تَرْضَىٰهُ وَأَدْخِلْنِى بِرَحْمَتِكَ فِى عِبَادِكَ ٱلصَّـٰلِحِينَ
verses.text_uthmani_tajweed_parsed: فَتَبَسَّمَ ضَاحِ<tajweed class='idgh_ghn' data-type='idgham-without-ghunnah' data-description='Idgham - With Ghunnah' data-tajweed=':9920'>كًا م</tajweed>ِّ<tajweed class='ikhf' data-type='ikhafa' data-description='Ikhafa'' data-tajweed=':9921'>ن ق</tajweed>َوْلِهَا وَقَالَ رَبِّ أَوْزِعْن<tajweed class='madda_obligatory' data-type='madda-obligatory' data-description='Obligatory Prolongation: 4-5 Vowels'>ِىٓ</tajweed> أَنْ أَشْكُرَ نِعْمَتَكَ <tajweed class='ham_wasl' data-type='hamza-wasl' data-description='Hamzat ul Wasl' data-tajweed=':9922'>ٱ</tajweed>لَّت<tajweed class='madda_obligatory' data-type='madda-obligatory' data-description='Obligatory Prolongation: 4-5 Vowels'>ِىٓ</tajweed> أَنْعَمْتَ عَلَىَّ وَعَلَىٰ و<tajweed class='madda_normal' data-type='madda-normal' data-description='Normal Prolongation: 2 Vowels'>َٲ</tajweed>لِدَىَّ وَأَنْ أَعْمَلَ صَ<tajweed class='madda_normal' data-type='madda-normal' data-description='Normal Prolongation: 2 Vowels'>ـٰ</tajweed>لِ<tajweed class='ikhf' data-type='ikhafa' data-description='Ikhafa'' data-tajweed=':9923'>حًا ت</tajweed>َرْضَ<tajweed class='madda_normal' data-type='madda-normal' data-description='Normal Prolongation: 2 Vowels'>ـٰ</tajweed>هُ وَأَ<tajweed class='qlq' data-type='qalaqah' data-description='Qalaqah' data-tajweed=':9924'>دْ</tajweed>خِلْنِى بِرَحْمَتِكَ فِى عِبَادِكَ <tajweed class='ham_wasl' data-type='hamza-wasl' data-description='Hamzat ul Wasl' data-tajweed=':9925'>ٱ</tajweed><tajweed class='slnt' data-type='laam-shamsiyah' data-description='Lam Shamsiyyah'>ل</tajweed>صَّ<tajweed class='madda_normal' data-type='madda-normal' data-description='Normal Prolongation: 2 Vowels'>ـٰ</tajweed>لِح<tajweed class='madda_permissible' data-type='madda-permissible' data-description='Permissible Prolongation: 2, 4, 6 Vowels'>ِي</tajweed>نَ
verses.text_uthmani_transcribed: Fatabassama ḍāḥikam min qaulihā wa qāla rabbi auzi'nī an asykura ni'matakal-latī an'amta 'alayya wa 'alā wālidayya wa an a'mala ṣāliḥan tarḍāhu wa adkhilnī biraḥmatika fī 'ibādikaṣ-ṣāliḥīn(a).
verses.translation: Он улыбнулся, уловив значенье ее слов, И, засмеявшись, обратился (к Богу): "О Господи! Внушением вели мне благодарным быть За все те блага и ту милость, Которые родителям моим и мне Ты ниспослал, И чтобы делал я добро, угодное Тебе. Твоею милостью введи меня в число Благочестивых слуг Твоих

verses.text_uthmani: وَتَفَقَّدَ ٱلطَّيْرَ فَقَالَ مَا لِىَ لَآ أَرَى ٱلْهُدْهُدَ أَمْ كَانَ مِنَ ٱلْغَآئِبِينَ
verses.text_uthmani_tajweed_parsed: وَتَفَقَّدَ <tajweed class='ham_wasl' data-type='hamza-wasl' data-description='Hamzat ul Wasl' data-tajweed=':9926'>ٱ</tajweed><tajweed class='slnt' data-type='laam-shamsiyah' data-description='Lam Shamsiyyah'>ل</tajweed>طَّيْرَ فَقَالَ مَا لِىَ ل<tajweed class='madda_obligatory' data-type='madda-obligatory' data-description='Obligatory Prolongation: 4-5 Vowels'>َآ</tajweed> أَرَى <tajweed class='ham_wasl' data-type='hamza-wasl' data-description='Hamzat ul Wasl' data-tajweed=':9927'>ٱ</tajweed>لْهُ<tajweed class='qlq' data-type='qalaqah' data-description='Qalaqah' data-tajweed=':9928'>دْ</tajweed>هُدَ أَمْ كَانَ مِنَ <tajweed class='ham_wasl' data-type='hamza-wasl' data-description='Hamzat ul Wasl' data-tajweed=':9929'>ٱ</tajweed>لْغ<tajweed class='madda_obligatory' data-type='madda-obligatory' data-description='Obligatory Prolongation: 4-5 Vowels'>َا</tajweed>ٓئِب<tajweed class='madda_permissible' data-type='madda-permissible' data-description='Permissible Prolongation: 2, 4, 6 Vowels'>ِي</tajweed>نَ
verses.text_uthmani_transcribed: Wa tafaqqadaṭ-ṭaira fa qāla mā liya lā aral-hudhud(a), am kāna minal-gā'ibīn(a).
verses.translation: И он собрал на смотр птиц и молвил: "Что ж это (здесь) не вижу я удода? Иль он в числе неприлетевших

verses.text_uthmani: لَأُعَذِّبَنَّهُۥ عَذَابًا شَدِيدًا أَوْ لَأَا۟ذْبَحَنَّهُۥٓ أَوْ لَيَأْتِيَنِّى بِسُلْطَـٰنٍ مُّبِينٍ
verses.text_uthmani_tajweed_parsed: لَأُعَذِّبَ<tajweed class='ghn' data-type='ghunnah' data-description='Ghunnah: 2 Vowels'>نّ</tajweed>َهُ<tajweed class='madda_normal' data-type='madda-normal' data-description='Normal Prolongation: 2 Vowels'>ۥ</tajweed> عَذَا<tajweed class='ikhf' data-type='ikhafa' data-description='Ikhafa'' data-tajweed=':1966'>بًا ش</tajweed>َدِيدًا أَوْ لَأَ<tajweed class='slnt' data-type='silent' data-description='Silent'>اْ</tajweed>ذْبَحَ<tajweed class='ghn' data-type='ghunnah' data-description='Ghunnah: 2 Vowels'>نّ</tajweed>َهُ<tajweed class='madda_obligatory' data-type='madda-obligatory' data-description='Obligatory Prolongation: 4-5 Vowels'>ۥٓ</tajweed> أَوْ لَيَأْتِيَ<tajweed class='ghn' data-type='ghunnah' data-description='Ghunnah: 2 Vowels'>نّ</tajweed>ِى بِسُلْطَ<tajweed class='madda_normal' data-type='madda-normal' data-description='Normal Prolongation: 2 Vowels'>ـٰ</tajweed><tajweed class='idgh_ghn' data-type='idgham-without-ghunnah' data-description='Idgham - With Ghunnah' data-tajweed=':7067'>نٍ م</tajweed>ُّب<tajweed class='madda_permissible' data-type='madda-permissible' data-description='Permissible Prolongation: 2, 4, 6 Vowels'>ِي</tajweed>نٍ
verses.text_uthmani_transcribed: La'u'ażżibannahū 'ażāban syadīdan au la'ażbaḥannahū au laya'tiyannī bisulṭānim mubīn(in).
verses.translation: Я накажу его суровым наказаньем Или зарежу, если он не принесет Серьезную причину (своего непоявленья)

verses.text_uthmani: فَمَكَثَ غَيْرَ بَعِيدٍ فَقَالَ أَحَطتُ بِمَا لَمْ تُحِطْ بِهِۦ وَجِئْتُكَ مِن سَبَإٍۭ بِنَبَإٍ يَقِينٍ
verses.text_uthmani_tajweed_parsed: فَمَكَثَ غَيْرَ بَعِي<tajweed class='ikhf' data-type='ikhafa' data-description='Ikhafa'' data-tajweed=':9930'>دٍ ف</tajweed>َقَالَ أَحَطتُ بِمَا لَمْ تُحِ<tajweed class='qlq' data-type='qalaqah' data-description='Qalaqah' data-tajweed=':8160'>طْ</tajweed> بِه<tajweed class='madda_normal' data-type='madda-normal' data-description='Normal Prolongation: 2 Vowels'>ِۦ</tajweed> وَجِئْتُكَ مِ<tajweed class='ikhf' data-type='ikhafa' data-description='Ikhafa'' data-tajweed=':9931'>ن س</tajweed>َبَ<tajweed class='iqlb' data-type='iqlab' data-description='Iqlab' data-tajweed=':9932'>إِۭ ب</tajweed>ِنَبَ<tajweed class='idgh_ghn' data-type='idgham-without-ghunnah' data-description='Idgham - With Ghunnah' data-tajweed=':9933'>إٍ ي</tajweed>َق<tajweed class='madda_permissible' data-type='madda-permissible' data-description='Permissible Prolongation: 2, 4, 6 Vowels'>ِي</tajweed>نٍ
verses.text_uthmani_transcribed: Famakaṡa gaira ba'īdin faqāla aḥaṭtu bimā lam tuḥiṭ bihī wa ji'tuka min saba'im binaba'iy yaqīn(in).
verses.translation: Удод же задержался ненадолго И, (прилетев), сказал: "Узнал я то, чего не знаешь ты. Я прилетел к тебе от Сабы с верной вестью

verses.text_uthmani: إِنِّى وَجَدتُّ ٱمْرَأَةً تَمْلِكُهُمْ وَأُوتِيَتْ مِن كُلِّ شَىْءٍ وَلَهَا عَرْشٌ عَظِيمٌ
verses.text_uthmani_tajweed_parsed: إِ<tajweed class='ghn' data-type='ghunnah' data-description='Ghunnah: 2 Vowels'>نّ</tajweed>ِى وَجَ<tajweed class='idgh_mus' data-type='idgham-mutajanisayn' data-description='Idgham - Mutajanisayn' data-tajweed=':9934'>د</tajweed>تُّ <tajweed class='ham_wasl' data-type='hamza-wasl' data-description='Hamzat ul Wasl' data-tajweed=':9935'>ٱ</tajweed>مْرَأَ<tajweed class='ikhf' data-type='ikhafa' data-description='Ikhafa'' data-tajweed=':9936'>ةً ت</tajweed>َمْلِكُهُمْ وَأُوتِيَتْ مِ<tajweed class='ikhf' data-type='ikhafa' data-description='Ikhafa'' data-tajweed=':843'>ن ك</tajweed>ُلِّ ش<tajweed class='idgh_ghn' data-type='idgham-without-ghunnah' data-description='Idgham - With Ghunnah' data-tajweed=':9937'>َىْءٍ و</tajweed>َلَهَا عَرْشٌ عَظ<tajweed class='madda_permissible' data-type='madda-permissible' data-description='Permissible Prolongation: 2, 4, 6 Vowels'>ِي</tajweed>مٌ
verses.text_uthmani_transcribed: Innī wajattumra'atan tamlikuhum wa ūtiyat min kulli syai'iw wa lahā 'arsyun 'aẓīm(un).
verses.translation: Нашел я женщину, что ими правит там. Дарами (щедрыми) она наделена, И у нее великий трон

verses.text_uthmani: وَجَدتُّهَا وَقَوْمَهَا يَسْجُدُونَ لِلشَّمْسِ مِن دُونِ ٱللَّهِ وَزَيَّنَ لَهُمُ ٱلشَّيْطَـٰنُ أَعْمَـٰلَهُمْ فَصَدَّهُمْ عَنِ ٱلسَّبِيلِ فَهُمْ لَا يَهْتَدُونَ
verses.text_uthmani_tajweed_parsed: وَجَ<tajweed class='idgh_mus' data-type='idgham-mutajanisayn' data-description='Idgham - Mutajanisayn' data-tajweed=':9938'>د</tajweed>تُّهَا وَقَوْمَهَا يَسْجُدُونَ لِلشَّمْسِ مِ<tajweed class='ikhf' data-type='ikhafa' data-description='Ikhafa'' data-tajweed=':107'>ن د</tajweed>ُونِ <tajweed class='ham_wasl' data-type='hamza-wasl' data-description='Hamzat ul Wasl' data-tajweed=':108'>ٱ</tajweed>للَّهِ وَزَيَّنَ لَهُمُ <tajweed class='ham_wasl' data-type='hamza-wasl' data-description='Hamzat ul Wasl' data-tajweed=':4046'>ٱ</tajweed><tajweed class='slnt' data-type='laam-shamsiyah' data-description='Lam Shamsiyyah'>ل</tajweed>شَّيْطَ<tajweed class='madda_normal' data-type='madda-normal' data-description='Normal Prolongation: 2 Vowels'>ـٰ</tajweed>نُ أَعْمَ<tajweed class='madda_normal' data-type='madda-normal' data-description='Normal Prolongation: 2 Vowels'>ـٰ</tajweed>لَهُمْ فَصَدَّهُمْ عَنِ <tajweed class='ham_wasl' data-type='hamza-wasl' data-description='Hamzat ul Wasl' data-tajweed=':6998'>ٱ</tajweed><tajweed class='slnt' data-type='laam-shamsiyah' data-description='Lam Shamsiyyah'>ل</tajweed>سَّبِيلِ فَهُمْ لَا يَهْتَد<tajweed class='madda_permissible' data-type='madda-permissible' data-description='Permissible Prolongation: 2, 4, 6 Vowels'>ُو</tajweed>نَ
verses.text_uthmani_transcribed: Wajattuhā wa qaumahā yasjudūna lisy-syamsi min dūnillāhi wa zayyana lahumusy-syaiṭānu a'mālahum fa ṣaddahum 'anis-sabīli fahum lā yahtadūn(a).
verses.translation: Нашел я, что она и люди (ее царства) Вместо Аллаха солнце чтят. Им Сатана дела их разукрасил И уклонил с (Господнего) пути - (Теперь) они прямой (стезею) не идут

verses.text_uthmani: أَلَّا يَسْجُدُوا۟ لِلَّهِ ٱلَّذِى يُخْرِجُ ٱلْخَبْءَ فِى ٱلسَّمَـٰوَٰتِ وَٱلْأَرْضِ وَيَعْلَمُ مَا تُخْفُونَ وَمَا تُعْلِنُونَ
verses.text_uthmani_tajweed_parsed: أَلَّا يَسْجُدُو<tajweed class='slnt' data-type='silent' data-description='Silent'>اْ</tajweed> لِلَّهِ <tajweed class='ham_wasl' data-type='hamza-wasl' data-description='Hamzat ul Wasl' data-tajweed=':3912'>ٱ</tajweed>لَّذِى يُخْرِجُ <tajweed class='ham_wasl' data-type='hamza-wasl' data-description='Hamzat ul Wasl' data-tajweed=':9939'>ٱ</tajweed>لْخَ<tajweed class='qlq' data-type='qalaqah' data-description='Qalaqah' data-tajweed=':9940'>بْ</tajweed>ءَ فِى <tajweed class='ham_wasl' data-type='hamza-wasl' data-description='Hamzat ul Wasl' data-tajweed=':609'>ٱ</tajweed><tajweed class='slnt' data-type='laam-shamsiyah' data-description='Lam Shamsiyyah'>ل</tajweed>سَّمَ<tajweed class='madda_normal' data-type='madda-normal' data-description='Normal Prolongation: 2 Vowels'>ـٰ</tajweed>و<tajweed class='madda_normal' data-type='madda-normal' data-description='Normal Prolongation: 2 Vowels'>َٲ</tajweed>تِ وَ<tajweed class='ham_wasl' data-type='hamza-wasl' data-description='Hamzat ul Wasl' data-tajweed=':177'>ٱ</tajweed>لْأَرْضِ وَيَعْلَمُ مَا تُخْفُونَ وَمَا تُعْلِن<tajweed class='madda_permissible' data-type='madda-permissible' data-description='Permissible Prolongation: 2, 4, 6 Vowels'>ُو</tajweed>نَ
verses.text_uthmani_transcribed: Allā yasjudū lillāhil-lażī yukhrijul-khab'a fis-samāwāti wal-arḍi wa ya'lamu mā tukhfūna wa mā tu'linūn(a).
verses.translation: Чтобы они (Единому) Аллаху не молились, Который выявляет скрытое в земле и в небесах И знает то, что вы скрываете (в душе), И то, что вы являете открыто

verses.text_uthmani: ٱللَّهُ لَآ إِلَـٰهَ إِلَّا هُوَ رَبُّ ٱلْعَرْشِ ٱلْعَظِيمِ ۩
verses.text_uthmani_tajweed_parsed: ٱللَّهُ ل<tajweed class='madda_obligatory' data-type='madda-obligatory' data-description='Obligatory Prolongation: 4-5 Vowels'>َآ</tajweed> إِلَ<tajweed class='madda_normal' data-type='madda-normal' data-description='Normal Prolongation: 2 Vowels'>ـٰ</tajweed>هَ إِلَّا هُوَ رَبُّ <tajweed class='ham_wasl' data-type='hamza-wasl' data-description='Hamzat ul Wasl' data-tajweed=':5930'>ٱ</tajweed>لْعَرْشِ <tajweed class='ham_wasl' data-type='hamza-wasl' data-description='Hamzat ul Wasl' data-tajweed=':5931'>ٱ</tajweed>لْعَظِ<tajweed class='madda_permissible' data-type='madda-permissible' data-description='Permissible Prolongation: 2, 4, 6 Vowels'>ي</tajweed>مِ ۩
verses.text_uthmani_transcribed: Allāhu lā ilāha illā huwa rabbul-'arsyil-'aẓīm(i).
verses.translation: Аллах, - кроме Него, иного Бога нет, - Господь Великого Престола

verses.text_uthmani: ۞ قَالَ سَنَنظُرُ أَصَدَقْتَ أَمْ كُنتَ مِنَ ٱلْكَـٰذِبِينَ
verses.text_uthmani_tajweed_parsed: ۞ قَالَ سَنَ<tajweed class='ikhf' data-type='ikhafa' data-description='Ikhafa'' data-tajweed=':9941'>نظ</tajweed>ُرُ أَصَدَ<tajweed class='qlq' data-type='qalaqah' data-description='Qalaqah' data-tajweed=':9942'>قْ</tajweed>تَ أَمْ كُ<tajweed class='ikhf' data-type='ikhafa' data-description='Ikhafa'' data-tajweed=':735'>نت</tajweed>َ مِنَ <tajweed class='ham_wasl' data-type='hamza-wasl' data-description='Hamzat ul Wasl' data-tajweed=':4785'>ٱ</tajweed>لْكَ<tajweed class='madda_normal' data-type='madda-normal' data-description='Normal Prolongation: 2 Vowels'>ـٰ</tajweed>ذِب<tajweed class='madda_permissible' data-type='madda-permissible' data-description='Permissible Prolongation: 2, 4, 6 Vowels'>ِي</tajweed>نَ
verses.text_uthmani_transcribed: Qāla sananẓuru aṣadaqta am kunta minal-kāżibīn(a).
verses.translation: Посмотрим мы: Сказал ты правду иль солгал, - ответил (Сулейман)

verses.text_uthmani: ٱذْهَب بِّكِتَـٰبِى هَـٰذَا فَأَلْقِهْ إِلَيْهِمْ ثُمَّ تَوَلَّ عَنْهُمْ فَٱنظُرْ مَاذَا يَرْجِعُونَ
verses.text_uthmani_tajweed_parsed: ٱذْهَب بِّكِتَ<tajweed class='madda_normal' data-type='madda-normal' data-description='Normal Prolongation: 2 Vowels'>ـٰ</tajweed>بِى هَ<tajweed class='madda_normal' data-type='madda-normal' data-description='Normal Prolongation: 2 Vowels'>ـٰ</tajweed>ذَا فَأَلْقِهْ إِلَيْهِمْ ثُ<tajweed class='ghn' data-type='ghunnah' data-description='Ghunnah: 2 Vowels'>مّ</tajweed>َ تَوَلَّ عَنْهُمْ فَ<tajweed class='ham_wasl' data-type='hamza-wasl' data-description='Hamzat ul Wasl' data-tajweed=':1513'>ٱ</tajweed><tajweed class='ikhf' data-type='ikhafa' data-description='Ikhafa'' data-tajweed=':1513'>نظ</tajweed>ُرْ مَاذَا يَرْجِع<tajweed class='madda_permissible' data-type='madda-permissible' data-description='Permissible Prolongation: 2, 4, 6 Vowels'>ُو</tajweed>نَ
verses.text_uthmani_transcribed: Iżhab bikitābī hāżā fa alqih ilaihim ṡumma tawalla 'anhum fanẓur māżā yarji'ūn(a).
verses.translation: Ступай с моим письмом и им доставь его, Потом от них назад подайся (И дай им время поразмыслить), Чтоб посмотреть, как на него они ответят

verses.text_uthmani: قَالَتْ يَـٰٓأَيُّهَا ٱلْمَلَؤُا۟ إِنِّىٓ أُلْقِىَ إِلَىَّ كِتَـٰبٌ كَرِيمٌ
verses.text_uthmani_tajweed_parsed: قَالَتْ يَ<tajweed class='madda_obligatory' data-type='madda-obligatory' data-description='Obligatory Prolongation: 4-5 Vowels'>ـٰٓ</tajweed>أَيُّهَا <tajweed class='ham_wasl' data-type='hamza-wasl' data-description='Hamzat ul Wasl' data-tajweed=':9943'>ٱ</tajweed>لْمَلَؤُ<tajweed class='slnt' data-type='silent' data-description='Silent'>اْ</tajweed> إِ<tajweed class='ghn' data-type='ghunnah' data-description='Ghunnah: 2 Vowels'>نّ</tajweed><tajweed class='madda_obligatory' data-type='madda-obligatory' data-description='Obligatory Prolongation: 4-5 Vowels'>ِىٓ</tajweed> أُلْقِىَ إِلَىَّ كِتَ<tajweed class='madda_normal' data-type='madda-normal' data-description='Normal Prolongation: 2 Vowels'>ـٰ</tajweed><tajweed class='ikhf' data-type='ikhafa' data-description='Ikhafa'' data-tajweed=':9944'>بٌ ك</tajweed>َر<tajweed class='madda_permissible' data-type='madda-permissible' data-description='Permissible Prolongation: 2, 4, 6 Vowels'>ِي</tajweed>مٌ
verses.text_uthmani_transcribed: Qālat yā ayyuhal-mala'u innī ulqiya ilayya kitābun karīm(un).
verses.translation: Она сказала: "О вельможи! Доставлено мне важное письмо

verses.text_uthmani: إِنَّهُۥ مِن سُلَيْمَـٰنَ وَإِنَّهُۥ بِسْمِ ٱللَّهِ ٱلرَّحْمَـٰنِ ٱلرَّحِيمِ
verses.text_uthmani_tajweed_parsed: إِ<tajweed class='ghn' data-type='ghunnah' data-description='Ghunnah: 2 Vowels'>نّ</tajweed>َهُ<tajweed class='madda_normal' data-type='madda-normal' data-description='Normal Prolongation: 2 Vowels'>ۥ</tajweed> مِ<tajweed class='ikhf' data-type='ikhafa' data-description='Ikhafa'' data-tajweed=':9945'>ن س</tajweed>ُلَيْمَ<tajweed class='madda_normal' data-type='madda-normal' data-description='Normal Prolongation: 2 Vowels'>ـٰ</tajweed>نَ وَإِ<tajweed class='ghn' data-type='ghunnah' data-description='Ghunnah: 2 Vowels'>نّ</tajweed>َهُ<tajweed class='madda_normal' data-type='madda-normal' data-description='Normal Prolongation: 2 Vowels'>ۥ</tajweed> بِسْمِ <tajweed class='ham_wasl' data-type='hamza-wasl' data-description='Hamzat ul Wasl' data-tajweed=':6335'>ٱ</tajweed>للَّهِ <tajweed class='ham_wasl' data-type='hamza-wasl' data-description='Hamzat ul Wasl' data-tajweed=':9946'>ٱ</tajweed><tajweed class='slnt' data-type='laam-shamsiyah' data-description='Lam Shamsiyyah'>ل</tajweed>رَّحْمَ<tajweed class='madda_normal' data-type='madda-normal' data-description='Normal Prolongation: 2 Vowels'>ـٰ</tajweed>نِ <tajweed class='ham_wasl' data-type='hamza-wasl' data-description='Hamzat ul Wasl' data-tajweed=':3'>ٱ</tajweed><tajweed class='slnt' data-type='laam-shamsiyah' data-description='Lam Shamsiyyah'>ل</tajweed>رَّح<tajweed class='madda_permissible' data-type='madda-permissible' data-description='Permissible Prolongation: 2, 4, 6 Vowels'>ِي</tajweed>مِ
verses.text_uthmani_transcribed: Innahū min sulaimāna wa innahū bismillāhir-raḥmānir-raḥīm(i).
verses.translation: Оно - от Сулеймана (и гласит): "Бисми ляхи Аррахман Аррахим

verses.text_uthmani: أَلَّا تَعْلُوا۟ عَلَىَّ وَأْتُونِى مُسْلِمِينَ
verses.text_uthmani_tajweed_parsed: أَلَّا تَعْلُو<tajweed class='slnt' data-type='silent' data-description='Silent'>اْ</tajweed> عَلَىَّ وَأْتُونِى مُسْلِم<tajweed class='madda_permissible' data-type='madda-permissible' data-description='Permissible Prolongation: 2, 4, 6 Vowels'>ِي</tajweed>نَ
verses.text_uthmani_transcribed: Allā ta'lū 'alayya wa'tūnī muslimīn(a).
verses.translation: Против меня надменными и дерзкими не будьте, Ко мне в смирении покорном приходите

verses.text_uthmani: قَالَتْ يَـٰٓأَيُّهَا ٱلْمَلَؤُا۟ أَفْتُونِى فِىٓ أَمْرِى مَا كُنتُ قَاطِعَةً أَمْرًا حَتَّىٰ تَشْهَدُونِ
verses.text_uthmani_tajweed_parsed: قَالَتْ يَ<tajweed class='madda_obligatory' data-type='madda-obligatory' data-description='Obligatory Prolongation: 4-5 Vowels'>ـٰٓ</tajweed>أَيُّهَا <tajweed class='ham_wasl' data-type='hamza-wasl' data-description='Hamzat ul Wasl' data-tajweed=':9943'>ٱ</tajweed>لْمَلَؤُ<tajweed class='slnt' data-type='silent' data-description='Silent'>اْ</tajweed> أَفْتُونِى ف<tajweed class='madda_obligatory' data-type='madda-obligatory' data-description='Obligatory Prolongation: 4-5 Vowels'>ِىٓ</tajweed> أَمْرِى مَا كُ<tajweed class='ikhf' data-type='ikhafa' data-description='Ikhafa'' data-tajweed=':2917'>نت</tajweed>ُ قَاطِعَةً أَمْرًا حَتَّىٰ تَشْهَد<tajweed class='madda_permissible' data-type='madda-permissible' data-description='Permissible Prolongation: 2, 4, 6 Vowels'>ُو</tajweed>نِ
verses.text_uthmani_transcribed: Qālat yā ayyuhal-mala'u aftūnī fī amrī, mā kuntu qāṭi'atan amran ḥattā tasyhadūn(i).
verses.translation: Она сказала: "О вельможи! Дайте суждение свое мне в этом деле, - Пока не будете при мне вы, Мне это дело не решить

verses.text_uthmani: قَالُوا۟ نَحْنُ أُو۟لُوا۟ قُوَّةٍ وَأُو۟لُوا۟ بَأْسٍ شَدِيدٍ وَٱلْأَمْرُ إِلَيْكِ فَٱنظُرِى مَاذَا تَأْمُرِينَ
verses.text_uthmani_tajweed_parsed: قَالُو<tajweed class='slnt' data-type='silent' data-description='Silent'>اْ</tajweed> نَحْنُ أُ<tajweed class='slnt' data-type='silent' data-description='Silent'>وْ</tajweed>لُو<tajweed class='slnt' data-type='silent' data-description='Silent'>اْ</tajweed> قُوَّ<tajweed class='idgh_ghn' data-type='idgham-without-ghunnah' data-description='Idgham - With Ghunnah' data-tajweed=':9947'>ةٍ و</tajweed>َأُ<tajweed class='slnt' data-type='silent' data-description='Silent'>وْ</tajweed>لُو<tajweed class='slnt' data-type='silent' data-description='Silent'>اْ</tajweed> بَأْ<tajweed class='ikhf' data-type='ikhafa' data-description='Ikhafa'' data-tajweed=':7663'>سٍ ش</tajweed>َدِي<tajweed class='idgh_ghn' data-type='idgham-without-ghunnah' data-description='Idgham - With Ghunnah' data-tajweed=':9948'>دٍ و</tajweed>َ<tajweed class='ham_wasl' data-type='hamza-wasl' data-description='Hamzat ul Wasl' data-tajweed=':4748'>ٱ</tajweed>لْأَمْرُ إِلَيْكِ فَ<tajweed class='ham_wasl' data-type='hamza-wasl' data-description='Hamzat ul Wasl' data-tajweed=':9949'>ٱ</tajweed><tajweed class='ikhf' data-type='ikhafa' data-description='Ikhafa'' data-tajweed=':9949'>نظ</tajweed>ُرِى مَاذَا تَأْمُر<tajweed class='madda_permissible' data-type='madda-permissible' data-description='Permissible Prolongation: 2, 4, 6 Vowels'>ِي</tajweed>نَ
verses.text_uthmani_transcribed: Qālū naḥnu ulū quwwatiw wa ulū ba'sin syadīd(in), wal-amru ilaiki fanẓurī māżā ta'murīn(a).
verses.translation: Они сказали: "Наша сила велика, и обладаем мы великой мощью, Но власть ведь у тебя (в руках); Смотри же, (чтоб не ошибиться), Какой приказ ты нам отдашь

verses.text_uthmani: قَالَتْ إِنَّ ٱلْمُلُوكَ إِذَا دَخَلُوا۟ قَرْيَةً أَفْسَدُوهَا وَجَعَلُوٓا۟ أَعِزَّةَ أَهْلِهَآ أَذِلَّةً ۖ وَكَذَٰلِكَ يَفْعَلُونَ
verses.text_uthmani_tajweed_parsed: قَالَتْ إِ<tajweed class='ghn' data-type='ghunnah' data-description='Ghunnah: 2 Vowels'>نّ</tajweed>َ <tajweed class='ham_wasl' data-type='hamza-wasl' data-description='Hamzat ul Wasl' data-tajweed=':9950'>ٱ</tajweed>لْمُلُوكَ إِذَا دَخَلُو<tajweed class='slnt' data-type='silent' data-description='Silent'>اْ</tajweed> قَرْيَةً أَفْسَدُوهَا وَجَعَل<tajweed class='madda_obligatory' data-type='madda-obligatory' data-description='Obligatory Prolongation: 4-5 Vowels'>ُوٓ</tajweed><tajweed class='slnt' data-type='silent' data-description='Silent'>اْ</tajweed> أَعِزَّةَ أَهْلِه<tajweed class='madda_obligatory' data-type='madda-obligatory' data-description='Obligatory Prolongation: 4-5 Vowels'>َآ</tajweed> أَذِلَّ<tajweed class='idgh_ghn' data-type='idgham-without-ghunnah' data-description='Idgham - With Ghunnah' data-tajweed=':9951'>ةً‌ۖ و</tajweed>َكَذ<tajweed class='madda_normal' data-type='madda-normal' data-description='Normal Prolongation: 2 Vowels'>َٲ</tajweed>لِكَ يَفْعَل<tajweed class='madda_permissible' data-type='madda-permissible' data-description='Permissible Prolongation: 2, 4, 6 Vowels'>ُو</tajweed>نَ
verses.text_uthmani_transcribed: Qālat innal-mulūka iżā dakhalū qaryatan afsadūhā wa ja'alū a'izzata ahlihā ażillah(tan), wa każālika yaf'alūn(a).
verses.translation: Она ответила: "Цари, входя в (иноплеменную) страну, Губят ее и разоряют, А благороднейших из жителей ее Лишают уважения и чести, - Так поступают (все) цари

verses.text_uthmani: وَإِنِّى مُرْسِلَةٌ إِلَيْهِم بِهَدِيَّةٍ فَنَاظِرَةٌۢ بِمَ يَرْجِعُ ٱلْمُرْسَلُونَ
verses.text_uthmani_tajweed_parsed: وَإِ<tajweed class='ghn' data-type='ghunnah' data-description='Ghunnah: 2 Vowels'>نّ</tajweed>ِى مُرْسِلَةٌ إِلَيْه<tajweed class='ikhf_shfw' data-type='ikhafa-shafawi' data-description='Ikhafa' Shafawi - With Meem' data-tajweed=':9952'>ِم ب</tajweed>ِهَدِيَّ<tajweed class='ikhf' data-type='ikhafa' data-description='Ikhafa'' data-tajweed=':9953'>ةٍ ف</tajweed>َنَاظِرَ<tajweed class='iqlb' data-type='iqlab' data-description='Iqlab' data-tajweed=':9954'>ةُۢ ب</tajweed>ِمَ يَرْجِعُ <tajweed class='ham_wasl' data-type='hamza-wasl' data-description='Hamzat ul Wasl' data-tajweed=':9955'>ٱ</tajweed>لْمُرْسَل<tajweed class='madda_permissible' data-type='madda-permissible' data-description='Permissible Prolongation: 2, 4, 6 Vowels'>ُو</tajweed>نَ
verses.text_uthmani_transcribed: Wa innī mursilatun ilaihim bihadiyyatin fanāẓiratun bima yarji'ul-mursalūn(a).
verses.translation: Но я пошлю подарок им и посмотрю, С чем посланные мною возвратятся

verses.text_uthmani: فَلَمَّا جَآءَ سُلَيْمَـٰنَ قَالَ أَتُمِدُّونَنِ بِمَالٍ فَمَآ ءَاتَىٰنِۦَ ٱللَّهُ خَيْرٌ مِّمَّآ ءَاتَىٰكُم بَلْ أَنتُم بِهَدِيَّتِكُمْ تَفْرَحُونَ
verses.text_uthmani_tajweed_parsed: فَلَ<tajweed class='ghn' data-type='ghunnah' data-description='Ghunnah: 2 Vowels'>مّ</tajweed>َا ج<tajweed class='madda_obligatory' data-type='madda-obligatory' data-description='Obligatory Prolongation: 4-5 Vowels'>َا</tajweed>ٓءَ سُلَيْمَ<tajweed class='madda_normal' data-type='madda-normal' data-description='Normal Prolongation: 2 Vowels'>ـٰ</tajweed>نَ قَالَ أَتُمِدُّونَنِ بِمَا<tajweed class='ikhf' data-type='ikhafa' data-description='Ikhafa'' data-tajweed=':9956'>لٍ ف</tajweed>َم<tajweed class='madda_obligatory' data-type='madda-obligatory' data-description='Obligatory Prolongation: 4-5 Vowels'>َآ</tajweed> ءَاتَ<tajweed class='madda_normal' data-type='madda-normal' data-description='Normal Prolongation: 2 Vowels'>ـٰ</tajweed>ن<tajweed class='madda_normal' data-type='madda-normal' data-description='Normal Prolongation: 2 Vowels'>ِۦ</tajweed>َ <tajweed class='ham_wasl' data-type='hamza-wasl' data-description='Hamzat ul Wasl' data-tajweed=':9957'>ٱ</tajweed>للَّهُ خَيْ<tajweed class='idgh_ghn' data-type='idgham-without-ghunnah' data-description='Idgham - With Ghunnah' data-tajweed=':2365'>رٌ م</tajweed>ِّ<tajweed class='ghn' data-type='ghunnah' data-description='Ghunnah: 2 Vowels'>مّ</tajweed><tajweed class='madda_obligatory' data-type='madda-obligatory' data-description='Obligatory Prolongation: 4-5 Vowels'>َآ</tajweed> ءَاتَ<tajweed class='madda_normal' data-type='madda-normal' data-description='Normal Prolongation: 2 Vowels'>ـٰ</tajweed>ك<tajweed class='ikhf_shfw' data-type='ikhafa-shafawi' data-description='Ikhafa' Shafawi - With Meem' data-tajweed=':9958'>ُم ب</tajweed>َلْ أَ<tajweed class='ikhf' data-type='ikhafa' data-description='Ikhafa'' data-tajweed=':428'>نت</tajweed><tajweed class='ikhf_shfw' data-type='ikhafa-shafawi' data-description='Ikhafa' Shafawi - With Meem' data-tajweed=':9959'>ُم ب</tajweed>ِهَدِيَّتِكُمْ تَفْرَح<tajweed class='madda_permissible' data-type='madda-permissible' data-description='Permissible Prolongation: 2, 4, 6 Vowels'>ُو</tajweed>نَ
verses.text_uthmani_transcribed: Falammā jā'a sulaimāna qāla atumiddūnani  bimālin famā ātāniyallāhu khairum mimmā ātākum, bal antum bihadiyyatikum tafraḥūn(a).
verses.translation: Когда ж (ее посланец) к Сулейману прибыл, Он сказал: "Ужель хотите (подкупить) меня богатством? Ведь то, что было мне даровано Аллахом, Лучше того, что вам Он дал. О да! Лишь вы способны тешиться подобными дарами

verses.text_uthmani: ٱرْجِعْ إِلَيْهِمْ فَلَنَأْتِيَنَّهُم بِجُنُودٍ لَّا قِبَلَ لَهُم بِهَا وَلَنُخْرِجَنَّهُم مِّنْهَآ أَذِلَّةً وَهُمْ صَـٰغِرُونَ
verses.text_uthmani_tajweed_parsed: ٱرْجِعْ إِلَيْهِمْ فَلَنَأْتِيَ<tajweed class='ghn' data-type='ghunnah' data-description='Ghunnah: 2 Vowels'>نّ</tajweed>َه<tajweed class='ikhf_shfw' data-type='ikhafa-shafawi' data-description='Ikhafa' Shafawi - With Meem' data-tajweed=':9960'>ُم ب</tajweed>ِجُنُو<tajweed class='idgh_w_ghn' data-type='idgham-without-ghunnah' data-description='Idgham - Without Ghunnah' data-tajweed=':9961'>دٍ ل</tajweed>َّا قِبَلَ لَه<tajweed class='ikhf_shfw' data-type='ikhafa-shafawi' data-description='Ikhafa' Shafawi - With Meem' data-tajweed=':9962'>ُم ب</tajweed>ِهَا وَلَنُخْرِجَ<tajweed class='ghn' data-type='ghunnah' data-description='Ghunnah: 2 Vowels'>نّ</tajweed>َه<tajweed class='idghm_shfw' data-type='idgham-shafawi' data-description='Idgham Shafawi - With Meem' data-tajweed=':9963'>ُم م</tajweed>ِّنْه<tajweed class='madda_obligatory' data-type='madda-obligatory' data-description='Obligatory Prolongation: 4-5 Vowels'>َآ</tajweed> أَذِلَّ<tajweed class='idgh_ghn' data-type='idgham-without-ghunnah' data-description='Idgham - With Ghunnah' data-tajweed=':9964'>ةً و</tajweed>َهُمْ صَ<tajweed class='madda_normal' data-type='madda-normal' data-description='Normal Prolongation: 2 Vowels'>ـٰ</tajweed>غِر<tajweed class='madda_permissible' data-type='madda-permissible' data-description='Permissible Prolongation: 2, 4, 6 Vowels'>ُو</tajweed>نَ
verses.text_uthmani_transcribed: Irji' ilaihim falana'tiyannahum bijunūdil lā qibala lahum bihā wa lanukhrijannahum minhā ażillataw wa hum ṣāgirūn(a).
verses.translation: А ты, (посланец), возвращайся к ним (и сообщи): Мы приведем на них такое войско, Против которого они не устоят; В бесчестии изгоним их оттуда, - (Лишенные всего), ничтожны они будут

verses.text_uthmani: قَالَ يَـٰٓأَيُّهَا ٱلْمَلَؤُا۟ أَيُّكُمْ يَأْتِينِى بِعَرْشِهَا قَبْلَ أَن يَأْتُونِى مُسْلِمِينَ
verses.text_uthmani_tajweed_parsed: قَالَ يَ<tajweed class='madda_obligatory' data-type='madda-obligatory' data-description='Obligatory Prolongation: 4-5 Vowels'>ـٰٓ</tajweed>أَيُّهَا <tajweed class='ham_wasl' data-type='hamza-wasl' data-description='Hamzat ul Wasl' data-tajweed=':9943'>ٱ</tajweed>لْمَلَؤُ<tajweed class='slnt' data-type='silent' data-description='Silent'>اْ</tajweed> أَيُّكُمْ يَأْتِينِى بِعَرْشِهَا قَ<tajweed class='qlq' data-type='qalaqah' data-description='Qalaqah' data-tajweed=':3282'>بْ</tajweed>لَ أ<tajweed class='idgh_ghn' data-type='idgham-without-ghunnah' data-description='Idgham - With Ghunnah' data-tajweed=':9965'>َن ي</tajweed>َأْتُونِى مُسْلِم<tajweed class='madda_permissible' data-type='madda-permissible' data-description='Permissible Prolongation: 2, 4, 6 Vowels'>ِي</tajweed>نَ
verses.text_uthmani_transcribed: Qāla yā ayyuhal-mala'u ayyukum ya'tīnī bi'arsyihā qabla ay ya'tūnī muslimīn(a).
verses.translation: (Потом) он обратился (к подданным своим): "Вельможи! Которые из вас (Способны) принести мне трон ее, Прежде чем явятся ко мне покорными они

verses.text_uthmani: قَالَ عِفْرِيتٌ مِّنَ ٱلْجِنِّ أَنَا۠ ءَاتِيكَ بِهِۦ قَبْلَ أَن تَقُومَ مِن مَّقَامِكَ ۖ وَإِنِّى عَلَيْهِ لَقَوِىٌّ أَمِينٌ
verses.text_uthmani_tajweed_parsed: قَالَ عِفْرِي<tajweed class='idgh_ghn' data-type='idgham-without-ghunnah' data-description='Idgham - With Ghunnah' data-tajweed=':9966'>تٌ م</tajweed>ِّنَ <tajweed class='ham_wasl' data-type='hamza-wasl' data-description='Hamzat ul Wasl' data-tajweed=':4673'>ٱ</tajweed>لْجِ<tajweed class='ghn' data-type='ghunnah' data-description='Ghunnah: 2 Vowels'>نّ</tajweed>ِ أَنَا۟ ءَاتِيكَ بِه<tajweed class='madda_normal' data-type='madda-normal' data-description='Normal Prolongation: 2 Vowels'>ِۦ</tajweed> قَ<tajweed class='qlq' data-type='qalaqah' data-description='Qalaqah' data-tajweed=':3282'>بْ</tajweed>لَ أَ<tajweed class='ikhf' data-type='ikhafa' data-description='Ikhafa'' data-tajweed=':5839'>ن ت</tajweed>َقُومَ م<tajweed class='idgh_ghn' data-type='idgham-without-ghunnah' data-description='Idgham - With Ghunnah' data-tajweed=':9967'>ِن م</tajweed>َّقَامِكَ‌ۖ وَإِ<tajweed class='ghn' data-type='ghunnah' data-description='Ghunnah: 2 Vowels'>نّ</tajweed>ِى عَلَيْهِ لَقَوِىٌّ أَم<tajweed class='madda_permissible' data-type='madda-permissible' data-description='Permissible Prolongation: 2, 4, 6 Vowels'>ِي</tajweed>نٌ
verses.text_uthmani_transcribed: Qāla 'ifrītum minal-jinni ana atīka bihī qabla an taqūma mim maqāmik(a), wa innī 'alaihi laqawiyyun amīn(un).
verses.translation: (И тут) сказал Ифрит из джиннов: "Тебе я принесу его, Прежде чем ты покинешь свое место, - Ведь я для этого силен и верен

verses.text_uthmani: قَالَ ٱلَّذِى عِندَهُۥ عِلْمٌ مِّنَ ٱلْكِتَـٰبِ أَنَا۠ ءَاتِيكَ بِهِۦ قَبْلَ أَن يَرْتَدَّ إِلَيْكَ طَرْفُكَ ۚ فَلَمَّا رَءَاهُ مُسْتَقِرًّا عِندَهُۥ قَالَ هَـٰذَا مِن فَضْلِ رَبِّى لِيَبْلُوَنِىٓ ءَأَشْكُرُ أَمْ أَكْفُرُ ۖ وَمَن شَكَرَ فَإِنَّمَا يَشْكُرُ لِنَفْسِهِۦ ۖ وَمَن كَفَرَ فَإِنَّ رَبِّى غَنِىٌّ كَرِيمٌ
verses.text_uthmani_tajweed_parsed: قَالَ <tajweed class='ham_wasl' data-type='hamza-wasl' data-description='Hamzat ul Wasl' data-tajweed=':9968'>ٱ</tajweed>لَّذِى عِ<tajweed class='ikhf' data-type='ikhafa' data-description='Ikhafa'' data-tajweed=':719'>ند</tajweed>َهُ<tajweed class='madda_normal' data-type='madda-normal' data-description='Normal Prolongation: 2 Vowels'>ۥ</tajweed> عِلْ<tajweed class='idgh_ghn' data-type='idgham-without-ghunnah' data-description='Idgham - With Ghunnah' data-tajweed=':9969'>مٌ م</tajweed>ِّنَ <tajweed class='ham_wasl' data-type='hamza-wasl' data-description='Hamzat ul Wasl' data-tajweed=':891'>ٱ</tajweed>لْكِتَ<tajweed class='madda_normal' data-type='madda-normal' data-description='Normal Prolongation: 2 Vowels'>ـٰ</tajweed>بِ أَنَا۟ ءَاتِيكَ بِه<tajweed class='madda_normal' data-type='madda-normal' data-description='Normal Prolongation: 2 Vowels'>ِۦ</tajweed> قَ<tajweed class='qlq' data-type='qalaqah' data-description='Qalaqah' data-tajweed=':3282'>بْ</tajweed>لَ أ<tajweed class='idgh_ghn' data-type='idgham-without-ghunnah' data-description='Idgham - With Ghunnah' data-tajweed=':9970'>َن ي</tajweed>َرْتَدَّ إِلَيْكَ طَرْفُكَ‌ۚ فَلَ<tajweed class='ghn' data-type='ghunnah' data-description='Ghunnah: 2 Vowels'>مّ</tajweed>َا رَءَاهُ مُسْتَقِرًّا عِ<tajweed class='ikhf' data-type='ikhafa' data-description='Ikhafa'' data-tajweed=':719'>ند</tajweed>َهُ<tajweed class='madda_normal' data-type='madda-normal' data-description='Normal Prolongation: 2 Vowels'>ۥ</tajweed> قَالَ هَ<tajweed class='madda_normal' data-type='madda-normal' data-description='Normal Prolongation: 2 Vowels'>ـٰ</tajweed>ذَا مِ<tajweed class='ikhf' data-type='ikhafa' data-description='Ikhafa'' data-tajweed=':6655'>ن ف</tajweed>َضْلِ رَبِّى لِيَ<tajweed class='qlq' data-type='qalaqah' data-description='Qalaqah' data-tajweed=':9971'>بْ</tajweed>لُوَن<tajweed class='madda_obligatory' data-type='madda-obligatory' data-description='Obligatory Prolongation: 4-5 Vowels'>ِىٓ</tajweed> ءَأَشْكُرُ أَمْ أَكْفُرُ‌ۖ وَمَ<tajweed class='ikhf' data-type='ikhafa' data-description='Ikhafa'' data-tajweed=':9972'>ن ش</tajweed>َكَرَ فَإِ<tajweed class='ghn' data-type='ghunnah' data-description='Ghunnah: 2 Vowels'>نّ</tajweed>َمَا يَشْكُرُ لِنَفْسِه<tajweed class='madda_normal' data-type='madda-normal' data-description='Normal Prolongation: 2 Vowels'>ِۦ</tajweed>‌ۖ وَمَ<tajweed class='ikhf' data-type='ikhafa' data-description='Ikhafa'' data-tajweed=':662'>ن ك</tajweed>َفَرَ فَإِ<tajweed class='ghn' data-type='ghunnah' data-description='Ghunnah: 2 Vowels'>نّ</tajweed>َ رَبِّى غَنِ<tajweed class='ikhf' data-type='ikhafa' data-description='Ikhafa'' data-tajweed=':9973'>ىٌّ ك</tajweed>َر<tajweed class='madda_permissible' data-type='madda-permissible' data-description='Permissible Prolongation: 2, 4, 6 Vowels'>ِي</tajweed>مٌ
verses.text_uthmani_transcribed: Qālal-lażī 'indahū 'ilmum minal-kitābi ana ātīka bihī qabla ay yartadda ilaika ṭarfuk(a), falammā ra'āhu mustaqirran 'indahū qāla hāżā min faḍli rabbī, liyabluwanī a'asykuru am akfur(u), wa man syakara fa'innamā yasykuru linafsih(ī), wa man kafara fa'inna rabbī ganiyyun karīm(un).
verses.translation: А тот, кто сведущ был в Писании, сказал: "Тебе я принесу его, Прежде чем дважды ты моргнуть успеешь". Когда же он увидел этот трон Твердостоящим перед ним, Сказал он: "Это - по милости Владыки моего, Чтоб испытать меня: Я буду благодарным иль неверным, - Ведь тот, кто благодарен (Богу), - Тот благодарен в пользу собственной души, А кто (в неблагодарности своей) неверен (Богу), - Так ведь свободен Бог от всяких нужд И в щедрости Своей велик и милосерден

verses.text_uthmani: قَالَ نَكِّرُوا۟ لَهَا عَرْشَهَا نَنظُرْ أَتَهْتَدِىٓ أَمْ تَكُونُ مِنَ ٱلَّذِينَ لَا يَهْتَدُونَ
verses.text_uthmani_tajweed_parsed: قَالَ نَكِّرُو<tajweed class='slnt' data-type='silent' data-description='Silent'>اْ</tajweed> لَهَا عَرْشَهَا نَ<tajweed class='ikhf' data-type='ikhafa' data-description='Ikhafa'' data-tajweed=':9974'>نظ</tajweed>ُرْ أَتَهْتَد<tajweed class='madda_obligatory' data-type='madda-obligatory' data-description='Obligatory Prolongation: 4-5 Vowels'>ِىٓ</tajweed> أَمْ تَكُونُ مِنَ <tajweed class='ham_wasl' data-type='hamza-wasl' data-description='Hamzat ul Wasl' data-tajweed=':523'>ٱ</tajweed>لَّذِينَ لَا يَهْتَد<tajweed class='madda_permissible' data-type='madda-permissible' data-description='Permissible Prolongation: 2, 4, 6 Vowels'>ُو</tajweed>نَ
verses.text_uthmani_transcribed: Qāla nakkirū lahā 'arsyahā nanẓur atahtadī am takūnu minal-lażīna lā yahtadūn(a).
verses.translation: Вы измените ее трон, - он продолжал, - И мы посмотрим: Пойдет ли праведным путем она Иль станет из числа заблудших

verses.text_uthmani: فَلَمَّا جَآءَتْ قِيلَ أَهَـٰكَذَا عَرْشُكِ ۖ قَالَتْ كَأَنَّهُۥ هُوَ ۚ وَأُوتِينَا ٱلْعِلْمَ مِن قَبْلِهَا وَكُنَّا مُسْلِمِينَ
verses.text_uthmani_tajweed_parsed: فَلَ<tajweed class='ghn' data-type='ghunnah' data-description='Ghunnah: 2 Vowels'>مّ</tajweed>َا ج<tajweed class='madda_obligatory' data-type='madda-obligatory' data-description='Obligatory Prolongation: 4-5 Vowels'>َا</tajweed>ٓءَتْ قِيلَ أَهَ<tajweed class='madda_normal' data-type='madda-normal' data-description='Normal Prolongation: 2 Vowels'>ـٰ</tajweed>كَذَا عَرْشُكِ‌ۖ قَالَتْ كَأَ<tajweed class='ghn' data-type='ghunnah' data-description='Ghunnah: 2 Vowels'>نّ</tajweed>َهُ<tajweed class='madda_normal' data-type='madda-normal' data-description='Normal Prolongation: 2 Vowels'>ۥ</tajweed> هُوَ‌ۚ وَأُوتِينَا <tajweed class='ham_wasl' data-type='hamza-wasl' data-description='Hamzat ul Wasl' data-tajweed=':9975'>ٱ</tajweed>لْعِلْمَ مِ<tajweed class='ikhf' data-type='ikhafa' data-description='Ikhafa'' data-tajweed=':6977'>ن ق</tajweed>َ<tajweed class='qlq' data-type='qalaqah' data-description='Qalaqah' data-tajweed=':6978'>بْ</tajweed>لِهَا وَكُ<tajweed class='ghn' data-type='ghunnah' data-description='Ghunnah: 2 Vowels'>نّ</tajweed>َا مُسْلِم<tajweed class='madda_permissible' data-type='madda-permissible' data-description='Permissible Prolongation: 2, 4, 6 Vowels'>ِي</tajweed>نَ
verses.text_uthmani_transcribed: Falammā jā'at qīla ahakażā 'arsyuk(i), qālat ka'annahū huw(a), wa ūtīnal-'ilma min qablihā wa kunnā muslimīn(a).
verses.translation: Когда она (на место) прибыла, ее спросили: "Это ли твой трон?" "Как будто б он, - она сказала. - Нам прежде было знание дано, И стали мусульмане мы, (Предавшись воле Бога)

verses.text_uthmani: وَصَدَّهَا مَا كَانَت تَّعْبُدُ مِن دُونِ ٱللَّهِ ۖ إِنَّهَا كَانَتْ مِن قَوْمٍ كَـٰفِرِينَ
verses.text_uthmani_tajweed_parsed: وَصَدَّهَا مَا كَانَت تَّعْبُدُ مِ<tajweed class='ikhf' data-type='ikhafa' data-description='Ikhafa'' data-tajweed=':107'>ن د</tajweed>ُونِ <tajweed class='ham_wasl' data-type='hamza-wasl' data-description='Hamzat ul Wasl' data-tajweed=':108'>ٱ</tajweed>للَّهِ‌ۖ إِ<tajweed class='ghn' data-type='ghunnah' data-description='Ghunnah: 2 Vowels'>نّ</tajweed>َهَا كَانَتْ مِ<tajweed class='ikhf' data-type='ikhafa' data-description='Ikhafa'' data-tajweed=':3024'>ن ق</tajweed>َوْ<tajweed class='ikhf' data-type='ikhafa' data-description='Ikhafa'' data-tajweed=':4873'>مٍ ك</tajweed>َ<tajweed class='madda_normal' data-type='madda-normal' data-description='Normal Prolongation: 2 Vowels'>ـٰ</tajweed>فِر<tajweed class='madda_permissible' data-type='madda-permissible' data-description='Permissible Prolongation: 2, 4, 6 Vowels'>ِي</tajweed>نَ
verses.text_uthmani_transcribed: Wa ṣaddahā mā kānat ta'budu min dūnillāh(i), innahā kānat min qaumin kāfirīn(a).
verses.translation: А почитание других богов, кроме Аллаха, Свело ее (с Господнего пути), - Она была ведь из неверного народа

verses.text_uthmani: قِيلَ لَهَا ٱدْخُلِى ٱلصَّرْحَ ۖ فَلَمَّا رَأَتْهُ حَسِبَتْهُ لُجَّةً وَكَشَفَتْ عَن سَاقَيْهَا ۚ قَالَ إِنَّهُۥ صَرْحٌ مُّمَرَّدٌ مِّن قَوَارِيرَ ۗ قَالَتْ رَبِّ إِنِّى ظَلَمْتُ نَفْسِى وَأَسْلَمْتُ مَعَ سُلَيْمَـٰنَ لِلَّهِ رَبِّ ٱلْعَـٰلَمِينَ
verses.text_uthmani_tajweed_parsed: قِيلَ لَهَا <tajweed class='ham_wasl' data-type='hamza-wasl' data-description='Hamzat ul Wasl' data-tajweed=':9976'>ٱ</tajweed><tajweed class='qlq' data-type='qalaqah' data-description='Qalaqah' data-tajweed=':9977'>دْ</tajweed>خُلِى <tajweed class='ham_wasl' data-type='hamza-wasl' data-description='Hamzat ul Wasl' data-tajweed=':9978'>ٱ</tajweed><tajweed class='slnt' data-type='laam-shamsiyah' data-description='Lam Shamsiyyah'>ل</tajweed>صَّرْحَ‌ۖ فَلَ<tajweed class='ghn' data-type='ghunnah' data-description='Ghunnah: 2 Vowels'>مّ</tajweed>َا رَأَتْهُ حَسِبَتْهُ لُجَّ<tajweed class='idgh_ghn' data-type='idgham-without-ghunnah' data-description='Idgham - With Ghunnah' data-tajweed=':9979'>ةً و</tajweed>َكَشَفَتْ عَ<tajweed class='ikhf' data-type='ikhafa' data-description='Ikhafa'' data-tajweed=':9980'>ن س</tajweed>َاقَيْهَا‌ۚ قَالَ إِ<tajweed class='ghn' data-type='ghunnah' data-description='Ghunnah: 2 Vowels'>نّ</tajweed>َهُ<tajweed class='madda_normal' data-type='madda-normal' data-description='Normal Prolongation: 2 Vowels'>ۥ</tajweed> صَرْ<tajweed class='idgh_ghn' data-type='idgham-without-ghunnah' data-description='Idgham - With Ghunnah' data-tajweed=':9981'>حٌ م</tajweed>ُّمَرَّ<tajweed class='idgh_ghn' data-type='idgham-without-ghunnah' data-description='Idgham - With Ghunnah' data-tajweed=':9982'>دٌ م</tajweed>ِّ<tajweed class='ikhf' data-type='ikhafa' data-description='Ikhafa'' data-tajweed=':9983'>ن ق</tajweed>َوَارِيرَ‌ۗ قَالَتْ رَبِّ إِ<tajweed class='ghn' data-type='ghunnah' data-description='Ghunnah: 2 Vowels'>نّ</tajweed>ِى ظَلَمْتُ نَفْسِى وَأَسْلَمْتُ مَعَ سُلَيْمَ<tajweed class='madda_normal' data-type='madda-normal' data-description='Normal Prolongation: 2 Vowels'>ـٰ</tajweed>نَ لِلَّهِ رَبِّ <tajweed class='ham_wasl' data-type='hamza-wasl' data-description='Hamzat ul Wasl' data-tajweed=':4'>ٱ</tajweed>لْعَ<tajweed class='madda_normal' data-type='madda-normal' data-description='Normal Prolongation: 2 Vowels'>ـٰ</tajweed>لَم<tajweed class='madda_permissible' data-type='madda-permissible' data-description='Permissible Prolongation: 2, 4, 6 Vowels'>ِي</tajweed>نَ
verses.text_uthmani_transcribed: Qīla lahadkhuliṣ-ṣarḥ(a), falammā ra'athu ḥasibathu lujjataw wa kasyafat 'an sāqaihā, qāla innahū ṣarḥum mumarradum min qawārīr(a), qālat rabbi innī ẓalamtu nafsī wa aslamtu ma'a sulaimāna lillāhi rabbil-'ālamīn(a).
verses.translation: Ей было сказано: "Войди в этот дворец!" Когда ж она увидела его, То приняла его за водяную гладь И (подняла подол своих одежд), Тем самым обнажив голень (ноги). "Дворец сей вымощен Хрустальною плитой", - сказал (ей Сулейман). "О Господи! - она сказала. - Я нанесла душе своей урон! Теперь я вместе с Сулейманом Предаюсь Аллаху, Господу миров

verses.text_uthmani: وَلَقَدْ أَرْسَلْنَآ إِلَىٰ ثَمُودَ أَخَاهُمْ صَـٰلِحًا أَنِ ٱعْبُدُوا۟ ٱللَّهَ فَإِذَا هُمْ فَرِيقَانِ يَخْتَصِمُونَ
verses.text_uthmani_tajweed_parsed: وَلَقَ<tajweed class='qlq' data-type='qalaqah' data-description='Qalaqah' data-tajweed=':341'>دْ</tajweed> أَرْسَلْن<tajweed class='madda_obligatory' data-type='madda-obligatory' data-description='Obligatory Prolongation: 4-5 Vowels'>َآ</tajweed> إِلَىٰ ثَمُودَ أَخَاهُمْ صَ<tajweed class='madda_normal' data-type='madda-normal' data-description='Normal Prolongation: 2 Vowels'>ـٰ</tajweed>لِحًا أَنِ <tajweed class='ham_wasl' data-type='hamza-wasl' data-description='Hamzat ul Wasl' data-tajweed=':3899'>ٱ</tajweed>عْبُدُو<tajweed class='slnt' data-type='silent' data-description='Silent'>اْ</tajweed> <tajweed class='ham_wasl' data-type='hamza-wasl' data-description='Hamzat ul Wasl' data-tajweed=':3704'>ٱ</tajweed>للَّهَ فَإِذَا هُمْ فَرِيقَانِ يَخْتَصِم<tajweed class='madda_permissible' data-type='madda-permissible' data-description='Permissible Prolongation: 2, 4, 6 Vowels'>ُو</tajweed>نَ
verses.text_uthmani_transcribed: Wa laqad arsalnā ilā ṡamūda akhāhum ṣāliḥan ani'budullāha fa'iżā hum farīqāni yakhtaṣimūn(a).
verses.translation: Мы к самудянам Салеха послали, брата их, И он сказал: "Аллаху поклоняйтесь!" Они же разделились на две группы, Враждующие меж собой

verses.text_uthmani: قَالَ يَـٰقَوْمِ لِمَ تَسْتَعْجِلُونَ بِٱلسَّيِّئَةِ قَبْلَ ٱلْحَسَنَةِ ۖ لَوْلَا تَسْتَغْفِرُونَ ٱللَّهَ لَعَلَّكُمْ تُرْحَمُونَ
verses.text_uthmani_tajweed_parsed: قَالَ يَ<tajweed class='madda_normal' data-type='madda-normal' data-description='Normal Prolongation: 2 Vowels'>ـٰ</tajweed>قَوْمِ لِمَ تَسْتَعْجِلُونَ بِ<tajweed class='ham_wasl' data-type='hamza-wasl' data-description='Hamzat ul Wasl' data-tajweed=':4563'>ٱ</tajweed><tajweed class='slnt' data-type='laam-shamsiyah' data-description='Lam Shamsiyyah'>ل</tajweed>سَّيِّئَةِ قَ<tajweed class='qlq' data-type='qalaqah' data-description='Qalaqah' data-tajweed=':3282'>بْ</tajweed>لَ <tajweed class='ham_wasl' data-type='hamza-wasl' data-description='Hamzat ul Wasl' data-tajweed=':6889'>ٱ</tajweed>لْحَسَنَةِ‌ۖ لَوْلَا تَسْتَغْفِرُونَ <tajweed class='ham_wasl' data-type='hamza-wasl' data-description='Hamzat ul Wasl' data-tajweed=':9984'>ٱ</tajweed>للَّهَ لَعَلَّكُمْ تُرْحَم<tajweed class='madda_permissible' data-type='madda-permissible' data-description='Permissible Prolongation: 2, 4, 6 Vowels'>ُو</tajweed>نَ
verses.text_uthmani_transcribed: Qāla yā qaumi lima tasta'jilūna bis-sayyi'ati qablal-ḥasanah(ti), lau lā tastagfirūnallāha la'allakum turḥamūn(a).
verses.translation: И он сказал: "О мой народ! Зачем спешите зло навлечь Прежде, чем вам (даровано) благое? Что ж вам не испросить прощения Аллаха, Чтобы помиловал (Он) вас

verses.text_uthmani: قَالُوا۟ ٱطَّيَّرْنَا بِكَ وَبِمَن مَّعَكَ ۚ قَالَ طَـٰٓئِرُكُمْ عِندَ ٱللَّهِ ۖ بَلْ أَنتُمْ قَوْمٌ تُفْتَنُونَ
verses.text_uthmani_tajweed_parsed: قَالُو<tajweed class='slnt' data-type='silent' data-description='Silent'>اْ</tajweed> <tajweed class='ham_wasl' data-type='hamza-wasl' data-description='Hamzat ul Wasl' data-tajweed=':9985'>ٱ</tajweed>طَّيَّرْنَا بِكَ وَبِم<tajweed class='idgh_ghn' data-type='idgham-without-ghunnah' data-description='Idgham - With Ghunnah' data-tajweed=':9986'>َن م</tajweed>َّعَكَ‌ۚ قَالَ طَ<tajweed class='madda_obligatory' data-type='madda-obligatory' data-description='Obligatory Prolongation: 4-5 Vowels'>ـٰٓ</tajweed>ئِرُكُمْ عِ<tajweed class='ikhf' data-type='ikhafa' data-description='Ikhafa'' data-tajweed=':264'>ند</tajweed>َ <tajweed class='ham_wasl' data-type='hamza-wasl' data-description='Hamzat ul Wasl' data-tajweed=':408'>ٱ</tajweed>للَّهِ‌ۖ بَلْ أَ<tajweed class='ikhf' data-type='ikhafa' data-description='Ikhafa'' data-tajweed=':428'>نت</tajweed>ُمْ قَوْ<tajweed class='ikhf' data-type='ikhafa' data-description='Ikhafa'' data-tajweed=':9987'>مٌ ت</tajweed>ُفْتَن<tajweed class='madda_permissible' data-type='madda-permissible' data-description='Permissible Prolongation: 2, 4, 6 Vowels'>ُو</tajweed>نَ
verses.text_uthmani_transcribed: Qāluṭ ṭayyarnā bika wa bimam ma'ak(a), qāla ṭā'irukum 'indallāhi bal antum qaumun tuftanūn(a).
verses.translation: Нам по (полету) птиц предвещано дурное от тебя И тех, которые с тобой, - они сказали. Предвестье ваших птиц - во власти (Всемогущего) Аллаха, И вы - народ, что, несомненно, (Он задумал) испытать

verses.text_uthmani: وَكَانَ فِى ٱلْمَدِينَةِ تِسْعَةُ رَهْطٍ يُفْسِدُونَ فِى ٱلْأَرْضِ وَلَا يُصْلِحُونَ
verses.text_uthmani_tajweed_parsed: وَكَانَ فِى <tajweed class='ham_wasl' data-type='hamza-wasl' data-description='Hamzat ul Wasl' data-tajweed=':4932'>ٱ</tajweed>لْمَدِينَةِ تِسْعَةُ رَهْ<tajweed class='idgh_ghn' data-type='idgham-without-ghunnah' data-description='Idgham - With Ghunnah' data-tajweed=':9988'>طٍ ي</tajweed>ُفْسِدُونَ فِى <tajweed class='ham_wasl' data-type='hamza-wasl' data-description='Hamzat ul Wasl' data-tajweed=':44'>ٱ</tajweed>لْأَرْضِ وَلَا يُصْلِح<tajweed class='madda_permissible' data-type='madda-permissible' data-description='Permissible Prolongation: 2, 4, 6 Vowels'>ُو</tajweed>نَ
verses.text_uthmani_transcribed: Wa kāna fil-madīnati tis'atu rahṭiy yufsidūna fil-arḍi wa lā yuṣliḥūn(a).
verses.translation: А были в городе том девять человек, Которые на той земле нечестие творили, Никак к благому не стремясь

verses.text_uthmani: قَالُوا۟ تَقَاسَمُوا۟ بِٱللَّهِ لَنُبَيِّتَنَّهُۥ وَأَهْلَهُۥ ثُمَّ لَنَقُولَنَّ لِوَلِيِّهِۦ مَا شَهِدْنَا مَهْلِكَ أَهْلِهِۦ وَإِنَّا لَصَـٰدِقُونَ
verses.text_uthmani_tajweed_parsed: قَالُو<tajweed class='slnt' data-type='silent' data-description='Silent'>اْ</tajweed> تَقَاسَمُو<tajweed class='slnt' data-type='silent' data-description='Silent'>اْ</tajweed> بِ<tajweed class='ham_wasl' data-type='hamza-wasl' data-description='Hamzat ul Wasl' data-tajweed=':32'>ٱ</tajweed>للَّهِ لَنُبَيِّتَ<tajweed class='ghn' data-type='ghunnah' data-description='Ghunnah: 2 Vowels'>نّ</tajweed>َهُ<tajweed class='madda_normal' data-type='madda-normal' data-description='Normal Prolongation: 2 Vowels'>ۥ</tajweed> وَأَهْلَهُ<tajweed class='madda_normal' data-type='madda-normal' data-description='Normal Prolongation: 2 Vowels'>ۥ</tajweed> ثُ<tajweed class='ghn' data-type='ghunnah' data-description='Ghunnah: 2 Vowels'>مّ</tajweed>َ لَنَقُولَ<tajweed class='ghn' data-type='ghunnah' data-description='Ghunnah: 2 Vowels'>نّ</tajweed>َ لِوَلِيِّه<tajweed class='madda_normal' data-type='madda-normal' data-description='Normal Prolongation: 2 Vowels'>ِۦ</tajweed> مَا شَهِ<tajweed class='qlq' data-type='qalaqah' data-description='Qalaqah' data-tajweed=':4421'>دْ</tajweed>نَا مَهْلِكَ أَهْلِه<tajweed class='madda_normal' data-type='madda-normal' data-description='Normal Prolongation: 2 Vowels'>ِۦ</tajweed> وَإِ<tajweed class='ghn' data-type='ghunnah' data-description='Ghunnah: 2 Vowels'>نّ</tajweed>َا لَصَ<tajweed class='madda_normal' data-type='madda-normal' data-description='Normal Prolongation: 2 Vowels'>ـٰ</tajweed>دِق<tajweed class='madda_permissible' data-type='madda-permissible' data-description='Permissible Prolongation: 2, 4, 6 Vowels'>ُو</tajweed>نَ
verses.text_uthmani_transcribed: Qālū taqāsamū billāhi lanubayyitannahū wa ahlahū ṡumma lanaqūlanna liwaliyyihī mā syahidnā mahlika ahlihī wa innā laṣādiqūn(a).
verses.translation: Они сказали: "Клянитесь именем Аллаха друг пред другом, Что ночью нападем тайком На Салеха и все его семейство. Потом же скажем мстителю его крови: "Мы не были при гибели его семьи - И правду говорим мы

verses.text_uthmani: وَمَكَرُوا۟ مَكْرًا وَمَكَرْنَا مَكْرًا وَهُمْ لَا يَشْعُرُونَ
verses.text_uthmani_tajweed_parsed: وَمَكَرُو<tajweed class='slnt' data-type='silent' data-description='Silent'>اْ</tajweed> مَكْ<tajweed class='idgh_ghn' data-type='idgham-without-ghunnah' data-description='Idgham - With Ghunnah' data-tajweed=':9989'>رًا و</tajweed>َمَكَرْنَا مَكْ<tajweed class='idgh_ghn' data-type='idgham-without-ghunnah' data-description='Idgham - With Ghunnah' data-tajweed=':9990'>رًا و</tajweed>َهُمْ لَا يَشْعُر<tajweed class='madda_permissible' data-type='madda-permissible' data-description='Permissible Prolongation: 2, 4, 6 Vowels'>ُو</tajweed>نَ
verses.text_uthmani_transcribed: Wa makarū makraw wa makarnā makraw wa hum lā yasy'urūn(a).
verses.translation: И стали они хитрость замышлять, А Мы Свою задумывали хитрость; Они ж об этом знать не знали

verses.text_uthmani: فَٱنظُرْ كَيْفَ كَانَ عَـٰقِبَةُ مَكْرِهِمْ أَنَّا دَمَّرْنَـٰهُمْ وَقَوْمَهُمْ أَجْمَعِينَ
